head: Choose Your Location NOW! The Perfect Floorplan!

head: Option to Buy -- 7 bedroom 5.5 bath Rocklin home
post: It has 7bedrooms, 5.5 baths. When you enter you begin to see the results of all the attention to detail. The entry has beautiful marble floor and a freeze relief on the wall that is just the beginning; it gets better and better from there. The corner room off the entry way has many window and overlooks the beautifully manicured tree filled yard, and can be used for so many things sewing/library/study, den/reading/utility and more. From there you find the well-designed pool room which is adjacent to the plush detail appointed entertainment/theater room. The fantastic kitchen is not only functional and spacious it is also exquisitely crafted, including the extra wide crown molding (which is curving around the generous room) & gorgeous with tons of space in the many cabinets and on top of the granite top kitchen counters and island, From the kitchen windows you can see the built in pool with surrounding concrete deck that looks like it was positioned perfectly among the landscaping. The bathrooms are beautifully appointed and the showers are wonderful with their tan slate wide open walking style --no curtains needed. There are more and more features left to discover. See the link below for up to 60 pictures of this home. Available Immediately, Granite Countertops, Separate Laundry Room, Marble floors, Upgrades Throughout Rent-to-Own terms are $6,800/mo. with $1,800 of every payment credited towards the down payment when you buy. Net purchase price after credits is $1,205,000 and Im looking for a family that can complete the purchase within 12 months. Call and ask for DOUG DEMETRE 916-826-3968

head: Central County RV Spaces Available!
post: We have spaces available for just $540 a month plus electric. These spaces will accommodate an RV, motor home or 5th wheel up to 34 feet long. These spaces have 30 amp electric service. Our space rent includes water, garbage and sewer. Electric is sub-metered at PG&E; rates. We are a quiet friendly park with lots of beautiful shade trees, restrooms with showers and coin laundry. We offer a month to month rental agreement with no move out required at the end of a six month term. Many of our residents have been with us for years! We are located at 110 Berry Drive in Pacheco. We are easy to get to (turn at Center Street off Contra Costa Blvd.) and just minutes from Hwy 680 and Hwy 4. Conveniently close to Martinez, Concord, Pleasant Hill and Sun Valley Mall where a variety of shopping and restaurants can be found. Check us out! We know you will be pleased at the convenient location, homey atmosphere, and friendly neighbors. Please contact Jo Ann at (925) 685-7530 for more information.

head: Spacious, well lit, hardwood floors
post: Large, sunny, historic interior, apartment, one bedroom, large living room, one bath with separate shower and bath. Sunny breakfast nook kitchen with excellent green views of Mt Sutro. One block from UCSF, shops, food. Two blocks from N-Judah line. Three blocks from GG park. Freshly finished oak floors, new paint throughout, dual pane windows(quiet), excellent closet space(3). Looking for an individual who enjoys living and will add to the environment. Electronic garage available for extra. Backyard with BBQ setup and chairs. Sorry no pets.

head: 1BR spacious sunny ground floor apt entirely within a quiet courtyard
post: 1BR spacious sunny ground floor apt entirely within a quiet courtyard - This apartment would suit a couple with no pets and no car. - Unfurnished 1 bedroom corner apartment on the ground level. - 800 sq.ft (40 x 20 ft) (12.2 x 6 meters). Note, this is very large for this price. - Situated in the middle of a quiet sunny courtyard, this apartment has no street frontage, and therefore gets almost no street noise. Secure locked entry to apartment complex. - The apartment doesnt have any neighbours connecting to any of its walls. The only connecting neighbour is upstairs, and he works a regular 9 - 6 office job. - Centrally located amongst four of the cleanest, safest, prettiest neighbourhoods. NOPA / Duboce Triangle / Hayes Valley / Alamo Square. - Double doors open between the living room and extra large spacious bedroom, giving the apartment an open plan feel. - The apartment has 6 large double glazed windows, so the entire apartment is light and bright. Most of the windows face South, for plenty of sun during the day, and one window faces East towards a green view of the yard trees. - The apartment entrance is on a quiet tree lined, one way street. See google map street view (map link below). Its the orange building with burgundy trim. - The garden has mint, rosemary, humming birds and butterflies. - Claw foot bath tub (very deep) with quality shower. Always plenty of hot water. - The kitchen has a very large gas range oven, full sized fridge and plenty of cupboards. - Bike racks in inner courtyard. 1.5 blocks from The Wiggle. - Cable ready for Comcast. Internet speed is great. - Two walk in closets. One is huge with three doors, two of which are fully mirrored. The second closet is average sized. - Wall heaters in each of the two main rooms easily heat the entire apartment, probably more than youll ever need. - The apartment is on the sunny side of the fog line. Its only a few blocks walk in any direction to Duboce dog park, Alamo Square, The Panhandle of Golden Gate Park, NOPA restaurants on Divisidero, Fillmore Street restaurants, Hayes Valley restaurants and Bi-rite organic grocery. This is a very beautiful area for walks. Gorgeous houses, parks and cafes everywhere. - Many choices of public transport within a few blocks. The N Judah and buses 6, 22, 24, 71. One bus trip to get downtown which arrive every 5 minutes. - Far from any fire truck routes. Very quiet. - Renovated floors and kitchen, and freshly painted this year. - Coin operated laundry across the street, which has secure entry for tenants only. - No parking provided. No rooftop access. No pets. No landscaping. - Zipcars three doors away, and City Car Share one block away. - $2,595 per month plus security deposit 1.5 x rent. - Rent controlled !!! - Available June 27th. - Open house Saturday June 22nd 11am - 1pm. Upon arrival call or text for entry. 415 200 9299

More than a building and an address, its a community, with a fitness center, a resident club, childrens play area, front desk associates and 24-hour Courtesy Patrol. The home can be available furnished or unfurnished as suits your needs. The property is in west Berkeley in a quiet residential neighborhood. The entire property is gated so its very safe and secure. The duplex is set away from the street and is surprisingly quiet. There is a private rear courtyard great for BBQs and socializing. The house is 1.69 miles from the UC Berkeley Campus and an easy 1 mile walk to North Berkeley Bart. AC Transit bus stops are nearby and the freeway is about 1 mile to the west. Excellent restaurants are within a few blocks (Sea Salt, Caffe Trieste, Priya); tennis courts, and the West Berkeley Pool and Branch Library are all a short walk from the house. Our wonderful next door neighbors have an organic farm with chickens, goats, and bunnies! The rent includes water and garbage. The security deposit is $2,200. Master suite is massive with carpets & hardwood flooring, 2 sided fireplace, doors to balcony, sitting area with closets and huge walk-in closet. Master bath has marble flooring, gas fireplace, dry sauna, 2 vanities, 2 toilet rooms, jetted tub, walk-in shower with glass block wall, double shower heads and sitting bench. head: Crocker Highlands / Upper Lakeshore
post: Located at 833 Paloma Avenue. Off Mandana Avenue. Built in 1924, this charming Craftsman home is located in the trendy upper Lakeshore area known as Crocker Highlands. This area is widely sought after to live in and known for the outstanding property values, shopping, restaurants and schools. Nearby Lake Merritt offers wonderful outdoor activities. While this home offers the charm of yesteryear, there is a modern addition of a large third bedroom. The layout and functionality are perfect. The home flows well from the entry to the living room to dining room to the kitchen. There are 3 bedrooms and 1 bath on one level. The home is elegant, spacious, yet maintains its authentic architectural detail with sunny and cheerful rooms! All the rooms have been freshly painted in tasteful and cheerful colors. Most of the house has beautiful wood floors. This home exudes charm. This home is less than a 15 minutes from UC Berkeley. PIXAR, Bayer, Kaiser, Summitt and Alta Bates Hospitals are all close. Downtown Berkeley and Oakland are 5 to 15 minutes away. There is excellent transit availability on Mandana and Lakeshore Avenues. Briefly, this stunning 3 bedroom and 1 bath (tub and shower combo with double basin sink) home has approximately 1520 interior sqft according to public record. This home offers an entry directly into the living room with fireplace (non-functional), formal dining room with built-in hutch, and spacious kitchen with appliances and separate laundry closet with appliances. The kitchen has a modern gas range, dishwasher, and disposal, refrigerator and lots of cabinet space. There is also a pantry and breakfast nook area. There are updated windows and coverings, along with an updated water heater and furnace. You will appreciate the abundance of natural sunlight from the many windows. The hardwood floors gleam from the sunlight. The rear yard is a gardeners delight. The rear yard is a small paradise with patio, trees, and is quite comfortable for bbqs and gatherings. And yes, a gardener is included. The one car garage is attached to the house and has a side entrance/exit, but no interior access to the house. There is additional basement storage. There is good street parking. Highlights: * 1 story home * 3 bedrooms and 1 bath * Approximately 1520 plus interior sqft * Built in 1924 * One car garage * Laundry on main level as opposed to basement * Kitchen appliances included (gas range/oven, dishwasher, frig, and disposal) * Formal dining room with hutch * Fireplace in living room (non-functional) * Hardwood, tile and carpeted floors * Interior recently painted * Tenants pay all utilities, owner will pay garbage and gardening services * No pets and no smoking * Alarm system wired. Tenant to reimburse owner for monthly service in addition to rent. * Application will be emailed upon request * Application fee is $30 per adult (18yo plus). Credit score needs to be 630 or better. * Verification of employment and funds are required. * Minimum annual lease * Available for $3500 per month with a $4000 security deposit. Available for lease now. 24 hour notice to show. Property Manager is Frank Hennefer Phone: 510-653-2755 CA DRE 00852682

post: Recently updated, this owner-occupied, high-end flat features an inviting open floor plan with high ceilings, crown moldings, recessed lighting, and hardwood floors. The kitchen features high-end stainless steel appliances, including professional-grade Wolf oven, and granite countertops. The kitchen peninsula provides additional seating for every-day use and is ideal for entertaining. With ample cabinet space and a small pantry/additional closet, the kitchen provides for all your storage needs. Occupancy has flexibility in July/August. Flat will be shown by appointment only.

head: Beautiful modern 2 BR/1 BA with Bay views, parking, storage
post: This beautiful  upper unit of a 2-unit duplex is available as of July 15th.  Dont miss out on the chance to get a home with a garage, an large storage room, beautiful views of the Bay, and privacy!  Remodeled just a few years ago with new paint and new windows, this home has expansive views of the Bay and is nestled by wonderful Oak trees.  French doors open from the dining room onto a deck.  The kitchen has an open air plan and flows nicely into the living room.  Hardwood floors are a sophisticated espresso stain, and plantation blinds are custom-made of white wood.  A wood-burning fireplace warms up cool winter evenings.  Our duplex is located in a quiet cul-de-sac at the top of a private driveway.  We designed the space to have a clean, modern feel. This is a perfect home for someone who wants to enjoy all the many charms of Sausalito and have a quiet and modern place to retreat to.  Garage for 1 car, an additional car fits in the driveway.   Large storage room with locked door in the garage.  Shared laundry room with the other unit.  Walk to public transportation for SF commute. No pets please. Open House Sunday, June 23rd 2pm - 3pm.  Email for address.

head: Ideal Location!  Close to Everything!
post: Welcome Home! Escape to charming Novato with our quaint shops, expansive open space and key geographic locale - Marins northernmost city is the hub to hundreds of exciting activities. Create your own adventure while experiencing the beauty and excitement of Novato. Millworks is designed to reach new levels of sustainability with the implementation of passive solar heating, high-efficiency water fixtures, sustainable flooring and an innovative living roof with growing vegetation. Residents will not only save money every month on lower energy bills, but also enjoy better health in their new home. Annual Festivities: -Novato Festival of Art, Wine, & Music - June -Infineon Raceway NASCAR & NHRA -Downtown Farmer Market - April to September -Bike Night - May -Nostalgia Days - August -July 4th Parade -Marin County Fair - July -Concerts in the Park - June to September -Stafford Lake Labor Day Fireworks -Salsa Festival - September -Holiday Shopping & Events - December Local Ammenites: -Choose for a a variety of excellent restaurants -Test your taste buds on world class wines -Horseback ride through Indian country -Explore historical museums and landmarks -Relax lakeside with a rod and reel -Discover the natural beauty of state parks -Observe birds and wildlife in preserves -Picnic in beautiful tree-lined parks -Play a round of golf -Bicycle under historic oaks -Hike forest trails and enjoy scenic vistas -Perus Old Towns shops and antiques Community Features: -Exercise and wellness room with state-of-the-art fitness facility (open 24 hrs) -Social room with TV & Wi-Fi (available to reserve for free) -Gorgeous rooftop garden featuring water fountains (with seating areas and night-lighting) -Whole Foods on site (delivers to our residents complimentary) -Underground parking (reserved spaces with individual bike hangers) -Controlled access (remote and key) -Recycling program -Concierge services -Secure storage cages -Alarm-monitoring available -Smoke-free community -Walking distance to downtown restaurants and shops -Easy freeway access -Sinaloa Middle School and San Marin High School -Close to transportation Home Luxuries: -Tile flooring in entryway, kitchen, and bathroom areas -Carpeted rooms -Bosch washer and dryer in every home (stackable, front-load, energy-efficient) -Air conditioning -Cat-5 wiring throughout home -Energy-saving dual glazed low-E vinyl/aluminum windows throughout -Wall and ceiling insulation meets or exceeds Title 24 energy code -Granite slab kitchen counters -Plenty of kitchen cabinet space -Long bar area -Bosch stainless steel gas range with microwave/hood combo -Bosch ENERGY STAR dishwasher -Ice Maker -Kohler faucets -Marble slab vanity bathroom counters and bath -Dual flush toilets 1, 2, & 3 Bedrooms Available! Our 2BD2BTH is located on our 3rd floor with large retail windows that have beautiful views of the city and Novatos rolling hills. This home has an additional large 7x7.5 ft. den space that is perfect to use as a computer room, extra storage, or a nursery. There are 2 large walk-in closets (one near the entryway and the other in the 2nd bedroom) The entrance is tile flooring, as well as the kitchen, dining, and bathroom areas. The master bath has two sinks with marble countertops and a stand-up marble shower with a glass door. Call today to schedule an appointment for a tour! Walk-ins welcome!! Directions: From Highway 101 exit De Long Avenue and go west. Entrance is on your right. Millworks Apartments 900 Reichert Avenue Novato, California 94945 (855) 248-9321 www.MillworksNovato.com

head: studio next to Rose Garden is like a ski lodge with a bay view!
post: It reminds people of a ski lodge because of the wood walls and high-vaulted ceilings, but your west side is all sliding-glass doors, opening onto patio/backyard and a view of San Francisco and the Bay. Its big enough for you to make into several rooms; the kitchen area includes large fridge, electric stove. Off-street parking space and shared washer and dryer are included. We can loan you most furniture, or not; storage space is available (for $300) in our large basement. Utilities are NOT included and range between about $40 to $90 per month. Wall-to-wall carpeting means extra deposit for a pet. Quiet neighborhood is between Rose Garden and Gourmet Ghetto; place is almost exactly 1 mile north of campus. This is the in-law unit of our house; you share the backyard with us, and we have two kids under the age of 4 as well as a very calm chocolate lab. Your dog needs to be *extremely* good with small children; we sometimes leave our 3-year-old in the back alone to play. The sounds of our kids (and neighbors kids) are a bit of a dull roar in the background; previous tenants havent complained. Cable is attached but off; you can pay comcast to turn it on, you can try to connect to our spotty wi-fi, or we can figure something else out. You have your own entrance; you have your own address. You give us a 1-month deposit, which means the total move-in cost is $3000. We require a one-year lease (we *cannot* do month-to-month), starting August 1, 2013 and ending July 31, 2014. Previous tenants have loved the place and stayed 3, 4 years at a time; we hope to find another person who may be open to that (we love stability). My mother bought this whole property in 1982; going back to her, she and/or I have been renting this space for about 30 years without problems. OPEN HOUSE this Saturday, June 22, from 12 to 2. Email to say youre coming and well give you the exact address. Look forward to meeting you!

head: Sunny, spacious 3 bd / 2.5 bth w/pool in Terra Linda / San Rafael
post: This contemporary townhouse in Terra Linda/San Rafael offers a secluded, peaceful environment with convenient access to 101, perfect for a family or couple. It features two spacious decks, one in front with views of the Marin County Civic Center, and one backing up to a private, golden hill at the rear. The garage provides parking for two cars and ample storage, as well as washer/dryer and tub sink. The first level above the garage features a living room, dining area and kitchen all with hardwood floors, as well as a coat closet, a pantry, and a half bath. The second level contains the three bedrooms and two full baths, as well as a linen closet. The master bedroom features an en suite with double sinks and an oversized tub/shower combination. One of the bedrooms has hardwoods and would make an ideal home office space. The other features built in shelves/desk and carpeted floors. All bedrooms have generously sized double sliding-door closets. Property features: - 2 large decks (perfect for grilling, container gardening, or just relaxing) - Access to private community pool - Abundant natural light - Central heating and air conditioning - Refrigerator, gas oven and range, microwave, dishwasher and disposal, breakfast bar in kitchen - Double sliding doors from living/dining area to front deck - Sliding doors in both master bedroom and second bedroom to back deck - Wood-burning fireplace in living room - Ventilating fans in all bathrooms - Spacious closets throughout - Ample storage space in garage Nearby amenities: - Located within award winning Dixie School District - Steps away from a small park with swing set - Short walk to Northgate Mall and movie theatre, CVS and Rite Aid, Chase Bank, walking trails in the Marin Hills - Long walk/short drive to Safeway, shops and restaurants, post office - Golden Gate Transit lines 38, 44, 45, 70 and 80 all in walking distance - Front deck is perfect for viewing 4th of July fireworks during the Marin County Fair! Rental price includes access to a community pool. Additionally landscaping services are included. Tenant responsible for utilities..... $150 includes PG & E, water and trash. Now showing the property by appointment only. Will be available for move-in on July 1.

head: Welcome to your new condo
post: This luxury 2 floor, 2 bedroom 2.5 bath end-unit townhome has panoramic views of the Marina and the Golden Gate Bridge. The entrance opens up to a living room with floor to ceiling, double paned windows and the rental includes use of a the preexisting wall mounted 58 HD TV. The first level also includes a half bath, upgraded kitchen with stainless steel appliances, and a dining area that leads to the first level outside deck, which includes additional storage and a grilling area. There are two separate staircases that lead to the second floor where youll find two master suites and a landing area. The master bedroom also has floor to ceiling double paned windows, views of the Golden Gate Bridge, and a jetted tub with a separate stand up shower in the master bath. This second level also includes the 2nd bedroom, with views of the Golden Gate Bridge as well, along with the 2nd full bath attached. The laundry closet with washer & dryer included as well as stairs that lead to the privately deeded rooftop deck can be found on the landing area between the two master suites. This unit has a private area on the rooftop with panoramic views (and use of existing teak patio furniture) of San Francisco, including the Bay, the Golden Gate Bridge, the Presidio, Pac Heights, as well as views of Transamerica Bldg, BofA Bldg, and Fort Mason. The unit comes with 1 car secure parking in Bldg with large additional Storage area. FEATURES: -Desirable end-unit -New Hardwood Floors in main living area -Gas Fireplace -58 TV included (mounted on living room wall) -Kitchen Appliances included -New Washer & Dryer included - Lots of Additional Storage -Secured 1-Car Garage -Additional street parking and parking garage within 1 block ($250/mth) AMENITIES: -Secured building with intercom entry system -SFMTA Parking Permit - (fee per vehicle & maximum of 4 per residence) -1 block from Restaurants/Bars and Shopping on both Chestnut Street and Union Street -Minutes from Marina Greens and Crissy Field -Steps from GOOGLE Shuttle -Easy access to freeways I-280, I-80 and HWY101, Marina, downtown San Francisco, the Financial District, and all modes of public transportation; Muni & Golden Gate Transit -Muni Lines: 22, 28, 28L, 30, 30X, 41, 43, 45, 91 -Golden Gate Transit: 2, 4, 8, 10, 18, 24, 27, 38, 44, 54, 56, 58, 70, 72, 74, 76, 80, 93, 101 SHOWINGS: By appointment only APPLICATION PROCESS: -Fill out application upon request LEASING TERMS: -Available NOW -$6100 - 24 month lease -$6300 - 12 month lease -Security Deposit of $6,300 -Tenant(s) pays PG&E; (Gas & Electric) - average bill is under $70/mth, Cable, Internet -Water & Trash included in rent

head: Extraordinary house with amazing views, 4-bed 3-ba, pets nego, garage
post: The house is on a double lot on a cul-de-sac in upper Cole Valley. The main level features bridge-to-bridge views upon entry. There is a large living room with a wood burning fireplace, and a large deck which leads down to a backyard. The kitchen is remodeled, and there is a dining room. The upper level has the same amazing views and features 3 bedrooms and 2 remodeled bathrooms, including a master bedroom and slate master bathroom with a soaking tub. The master bedroom has its own sun room which can be used as an office, as well as a south-facing deck. The other 2 bedrooms are separated by sliding door. The lower level features a large family room which opens to a large deck and leads to the backyard. There is also 1 bedroom or office and 1 bathroom on this level, as well as a laundry room. The location is quiet and secluded, but is still quite central with easy and quick access to shopping and dining hotspots in various neighborhoods. Shops and restaurants in Cole Valley and in Inner Sunset are within a quick drive via Clarendon Ave. The southbound and eastbound freeways are easily accessible via OShaughnessy Blvd to the 280 freeway. Also very close by are Twin Peaks and the Mount Sutro Open Space Preserve. Will be available in the middle of July. The house has a 2-car side-by-side garage, also with extra storage space. Pets are negotiable. The minimum lease term is 12 months. The house comes unfurnished. Mazal Bordo Relocation Agent 415 309 5667

head: Didn't get what you wanted from Santa?  Get it at Old Orchard Apartments - Flowi
Beautiful & Spacious 1Bedroom plus Den, with Fabulous Views & Parking!
post: Located at 38th Ave. and Geary, on the top floor (3rd floor, no elevator), this is a really beautiful 1BR/1BA corner apartment with office! The lovely hardwood foyer welcomes you centrally into the apartment where the spectacular panoramic view stretches out in front of you! You will enjoy light to lift your spirits everyday as the sun rises in the East, crosses over the apartment with warm South light all day, and finally sets in the West over the sparkling Pacific Ocean with fabulous sunsets! The living room is spacious and tastefully carpeted in a beautiful charcoal grey. The bedroom is carpeted in the same manner, is also spacious with new double paned Bay windows, and enjoys the same fabulous views east, south and west. The kitchen has recently been remodeled with beautiful granite counters, a nicely tiled floor, gas stove, refrig, (no dishwasher) a charming spice rack, pantry and plenty of cabinet space for the busy cook. The bathroom is also nicely tiled and has a tub and shower combination. There are 2 additional closets in the hallway, one for linens and one for coats, and there is a huge closet in the living room that is the size of some New York apartments! All the rooms have lovely glass, French doors that open up or close off rooms to accommodate your needs and whims. This apartment has a wonderful feel to it; it is very cozy, yet spacious and flowing, and the views that it boasts are spectacular! Not to mention that your energy bill will be lessened by the wonderful southern sunlight that pours in all day long (on sunny days!) Lincoln Park is only one block away for hiking and biking. And the fun Balboa neighborhood is only 2 blocks away, where you will find shops of all kinds and restaurants of American, Italian, Mexican, Chinese, Thai and Japanese cuisine. There is also a Movie theatre, a popular Sidewalk café, Hardware store, Video store, banks, fresh Produce markets, an organic Free Trade Bakery, places to grab a sandwich, and much, much more! Also close to Ocean Beach, the Cliff House, and only 4 blocks to Golden Gate Park. Public transportation is a snap, as right on Geary you can catch the 38 Geary busline which will take you all the way downtown and youll probably even get a seat! One car garage parking is included in the price. Washer and dryer in the building with a full laundramat in the next block. Landlord pays water and garbage. Sorry, no pets. For a private showing, Call Gene @ (415) 794-6644

head: BRAND NEW REMODEL : Beautiful Spacious TOP Floor 1Br, Hrdwd floor
post: BRAND NEW REMODEL : Beautiful Spacious TOP Floor Unique 1Br, Hrdwd floors Nob Hill 1 BR -- ** BRAND NEW REMODEL : New EVERYTHING ! Beautiful Bright Apt** Beautiful corner building with ornamental Lobby and GRAND Oval Spiral Staircase *** $2,950/month Available for Immediate Occupancy Now**** Shown by appointment Please send us email or call 415-271-2770 for appointment to view this beautiful apartment. Please use the following link to find a few photos of the apartment: A little about the building : We have an absolutely beautiful Lobby Entrance with Security Gate and Modern Intercom with a GRAND Oval Spiral staircase and a stained glass skylight A lot more about the apartment : We will gradually spiral our way up the Grand Oval staircase to the 3rd floor (TOP floor) and go the WEST hallway. Open the front door and you will be greeted by light, color, and shiny newly sanded and stained hardwood floors. To your LEFT is a separate room with 3 closets and a bay windows. To your immediate RIGHT is the bathroom w tub and overhead shower (NEW toilet, NEW vanity, NEW fixtures). To your further RIGHT is another separate room with 1 closet, and adjacent to this room is the GORGEOUS Kitchen ! Lets start with the NEW REMODELED KITCHEN : New granite counter tops, New wood cabinets throughout, New fixtures, New DISHWASHER, New GAS STOVE and fume hood and NEW Large refrigerator. New double-paned windows (quiet and insulated), light fixtures and vinyl flooring and LOTS of storage space in the curved PANTRY for the Trader Joe or Costco things ! Now lets go back into the LIVING ROOM and BEDROOM --- The Living Room is bright and warm with large NE exposure windows (NEW double paned windows, quiet and insulated). Beautiful Hardwood Floor throughout with inlay wood design. High ceilings with ornamental stucco desings, and NEW beautiful chandeliers. The living room has one large closet. The Bedroom is private and separated from the LR and is spacious, with 3 good sized closets and new double-paned vinyl bay windows (quiet and insulated) facing W on the top floor of the building. Now lets walk over to the BATHROOM : There is a Large and beautiful bathtub and overhead shower. NEW toilet, vanity, medicine cabinets, AND fixtures. Hardwood floors in living room, bed room and closets. There are lots of closets (did I already mention that ?). There are radiators for heat in the living areas. Internet and TV Cable wired; tenant pays subscription. Utilities: Included in Rent are Heat, Hot and Cold water and garbage. PGE to be paid by tenant. No Laundry in the building, but several Laundromats and dry cleaners within a few steps. Please send us email or call 415-271-2770 for appointment to view this beautiful apartment. A little about the location : This beautiful building is one block from the California Street buses and Cable car line. We are only 2 Blocks to the Polk and Van Ness corridor restaurants, bars, clubs, and business. TRADER JOES (Yes !) around the block on Hyde St. And of course, we are only few blocks from Grace Cathedral, Huntington Park, and the major Nob Hill Hotels such as Fairmont, Ritz Carlton, Mark Hopkins. Chinatown, Financial District, Ferry Building, Union Square are close and within walking distance. Now let me tell you about Parking : We dont have parking in the building. For those of you who are new, the City will issue a C-permit with your lease agreement which lets you bypass the 2 hour limit signs (exception of Street Cleaning days/times and No Parking Any Time). head: 2 BDRM DOWNSTAIRS POOL WATER AND GARBAGE INCLUDED
PRIME MIDTOWN PALO ALTO 1BR-Private Yard/Covered Patio-Cats Welcomed!
post: Great 1 bedroom apartment in the heart of Midtown Palo Alto , on a quiet street but only 1/2 block from Middlefield and 1/2 mile from Oregon Expressway. A 24/7 Safeway/CVS Pharmacy/Walgreens/Starbucks are just around the corner plus restaurants, banks, video rentals, dry cleaners, etc. Unique apartment with wood beam ceilings, skylights and a very large, Fully Enclosed, Private yard including a covered patio. Recently remodeled kitchen with maple cabinets, tile floors, self cleaning oven, microwave and dishwasher. New hardwood floors throughout the living room, hall and bedroom. Remodeled bathroom has a new ultra chic vanity and mirror. Part of a small (24 unit), 1-story complex so no upstairs neighbors to keep you up at night! You even have your own individual address (no apt #) and private trash collection right outside your gate (no long walks to a smelly dumpster). Meticulously maintained by the same owner for over 25 years. head: Amateur Actors, Hone Your Craft and Live in a Great Community!
post: We werent all meant for Hollywood or the footlights of Broadway. But that doesnt mean you want to live in a backwater with no appreciation for the arts! Martinezs Campbell Theatre is a first class community theater in Northern Californias best small town. The Muir Creek Apartments are first class, too, but we rent them at Economy prices! Were already $100 a month less than our competition, and we pay your water, sewer & trash which saves you an additional $55 to $85 a month or more! Simply put, we offer the most elegant Studio, 1 & 2 BR apartment homes around. Designed by an award-winning San Francisco architect, the spacious, light-filled units have carpet, mini-blinds, central heat/air, dishwasher, outside storage, plus built-in oven, range and microwave. Some even have washer and dryer hookups! The park-like grounds have tranquil canals, fountains, and bridges running throughout the complex, which you can enjoy from your balcony or patio. Recreational facilities include a sports court, pool, spa, clubhouse and well-equipped fitness center. Conveniently located across the street from the well-stocked Village Oaks shopping center, and BART access is practically on our front steps. The new Amtrak station will take you to Sacramento fast, but if you want to drive were not even a block away from Highway 4 and just minutes from the 680. Give us a call at 925-228-0760

head: Settle into this comfy studio before the winter chill comes!
post: - Lots of storage space - Plenty of space for a dining area -Full kitchenNorthpark, an Equity Residential community, has so many things to offer from the convenience of your home. Our resident portal is set up to help you not only do normal daily tasks from the comfort of your home but also reduce the carbon footprint of day to day life. You do not have to drive to the Leasing Office to drop off your rent check....you dont even have to write a check! Simply go online to our resident portal and pay directly online. You can save time by submitting work orders on the resident portal, check your resident statement, you can meet your neighbors, sell items that you no longer need to your neighbors or purchase things from them. We also have electronic applications and leases, reducing paper usage. In addition to upgrading our apartments, one of the investments weve made to make the whole property more environmentally responsible is the installation of new solar electric panels. These solar panels not only power the shared space at the property but even provide renewable energy to the grid when the sun is shining brightest. They also reduce the propertys carbon footprint by the equivalent of taking every car at the property off of the road. We like to play our part when it comes to helping our residents live a more environmentally friendly lifestyle.

Its most popular attraction is Lombard Street, which is known as the crookedest street in the world due to its seven sharp turns. Similarly, many of the sidewalks are stairways due to the steepness of the streets of this neighborhood. Russian Hill does have a lot of popular restaurants and shops down Hyde Street, and is nearby North Beach, which has even more shops. With significantly less crime than other areas of San Francisco, Russian Hill is a great place to live. MMG204

head: PRIVATE SHOWINGS AVAIL-PENTHOUSE FLAT-VICTORIAN MANSION, CIRCA 1898
post: *** PRIVATE SHOWINGS AVAILABLE - CALL RICHARD AT (510) 502-4885 IF INTERESTED TO MAKE AN APPOINTMENT FOR A PRIVATE SHOWING *** - THIS FLAT HAS A UNIQUE TOP FLOOR PLAN - Available for Rent: 1657 Hayes Street, #4, San Francisco Size: Four Rooms, 1 Bath Top Floor Flat (There are only three units in the building) Rent: $3,195 per month. Security Deposit: 1.25 x 1 month rent Parking: A private garage will be available for one car and possible storage, for additional monthly fees. Description: This top floor flat is located in a former mini-mansion with a formal lobby and a museum quality engraved entry door. The buildings Mansaard roof forms interesting A-frame-type angles in almost every room of this top floor flat. There are beautifully refinished soft pine floors throughout. This unique top floor level flat features a spacious living room, which is sunny and bright, creating a cheery atmosphere. The large master bedroom, 20 x 8, can easily accommodate a king-sized bed. In addition, there is a large bay window dormer, 6 x 6, which could accommodate your office. You can decide whether to have a formal dining room or a second bedroom, 11 x 8, or have the alternative of having both, whenever you wish, by way of three fabric sliding Soge screens. The unit has an eat-in kitchen, big enough to do some serious cooking, with enough room for a table and chairs. The bathroom has a unique smallish claw foot tub with a shower, which is completely workable, and has a wonderful wall of mirrors. The back stairs lead to a large fenced-in backyard facing south, which covers a larger area than the mansion itself on the property. The backyard, about 90 x 25, is set up for an active vegetable garden, community outdoor entertainment area and just wholesome outdoor enjoyment and living, and is excellent for gardening or just enjoying the year round sun. The unit has 8 ceilings and retains heat well. The overall atmosphere is so sunny and bright, with the many numerous windows facing in all directions, that you are just going to love it!!!. Location: What a great neighborhood! Not only is it located just a few blocks from one of the nicest parks around (GGP Panhandle), it also has a nice convenient grocery store down the street, between Central Avenue and Lyon Street., and a great little coffee café with tables and chairs, a half block away on Central Avenue. Local transportation is right outside the front door! This unit is close to every convenience, including USF, Masonic Boulevard, Trader Joes, etc. The nearest cross street is Lyon Street. head: Furnished Modern High-End Condo w/2Br/2+Bath & Bay Views!
post: This gorgeous two bedroom, two and a half bathroom condo is located in the heart of Nob Hill in a fabulous luxury building with twenty four hour doorman and amazing, direct bay views. The condo has been fully remodeled to reflect an ultra modern, high-end style with top of the line finishes. Every detail of the property has been carefully thought of and every luxurious amenity provided. There is a formal living room with exceptional bay views, gas fireplace and custom walnut and iron media component and shelving. The ceilings are beautiful with suspended glass bulb lighting and crown moldings, an art piece all in its own right. Flat screen TV and modern and comfortable furnishings provided. The dining room features a beautiful hand-crafted, slab walnut table and custom walnut and iron bar with northern views of the city. The kitchen is open to both the dining room and living room, perfect layout for entertaining. There is a large Cesar stone island with top of the line Swiss appliances. The master bedroom is light and airy with newly refinished hardwood floors, comfortable queen sized bed and an amazing walk in closet. The master bathroom is gorgeous with flooring, side walls, stand-alone shower and large tub made from slaps of Cararra marble accented with dark bronze fixtures. The second bedroom features a full sized bed as well as a twin bed and large desk with more great views of the bay. There is a second fully remodeled bathroom with large tile shower. One car parking included and laundry in the unit. This special condo is available now for those who expect luxury living in the heart of San Francisco.

head: Architectural Digest Published FURNISHED Home in the Redwoods
post: Dace@progressivesf.com Featured in Architectural Digest. Designed and furnished by one of the foremost U.S. interior designers. Set in a Redwood glade a short walk from downtown Mill Valley. This 1890 shingle-style, antique-filled, architectural masterpiece awaits a true connoisseur of life’s pleasures. Enter this incomparably FURNISHED home through one of three lovely patios into the bookcase-lined dining room with large overhead skylight. The 8-person antique dining room table plays host to dinosaur fossils, European sculptures, and first edition books. A gracious gallery with displays of mineral specimens leads to the sumptuous living room with more art and antiques, a wood burning fireplace, and a Mason & Hamlin grand piano that has been played by some of the Bay Area’s finest musicians. Lovely windows bathe the Persian rugs and a butterfly collection with dappled light underneath the original exposed ceiling beams. Relax in the window seat and enjoy a tree-top view of the surrounding forest. The kitchen is a chef’s delight containing a mixture of modern appliances and a meticulously restored, 1926 Magic Chef 6-burner gas stove and oven. The center island is the perfect place for cooking or sharing drinks with friends, and there is a lovely patio outside the kitchen doors that overlooks a hidden garden cove. The countertops are white marble and there is an extra large Farmhouse sink for easy cleanup. A Subzero refrigerator and Miele dishwasher complete the luxury. The large master bedroom is a cocoon of comfort and treats for the senses. Built-in bookcases conceal a sophisticate audio-visual system. The bathroom sparkles in white marble with a steam shower and soaking tub. Immediately off the master bedroom is a sun-filled office, sizeable enough for two home offices with ample bookshelves and built-in cabinetry. There is a 2nd small bedroom, which is currently set up as a reading room, with its own luxurious bathroom and shower. Immediately out the French doors is the 3rd patio for more indoor-outdoor living. The rental price includes weekly maid service as well as a gardener. Built by a Gold Rush bookseller from old growth trees, this amazing home will appeal to people who enjoy hiking, reading and music in the midst of unparalleled taste and luxury! Other features of the residence: - Stunningly beautiful gardens with mature foliage, old cherry trees, rhododendrons and fuchsia banks. - 3 terraces with lovely teak furniture and designer pillows and table - A fully equipped kitchen with exquisite cutlery and plate - Custom shelving and cabinetry in all rooms - Wood flooring in public rooms; radiant heat floors in both bathrooms - Designer light fixtures and controls, dimmers throughout - Custom designed window treatments throughout - 42 inch TV - Wired for audio zones with in ceiling speakers - In-unit washer and dryer - Alarm Rent $5,950/month Security Deposit: 2x rent 12 month lease Fully furnished Ready for immediate occupancy Tenant pays all utilities based on prorate sharing arrangement Owner pays for weekly maid service (except major holidays) and gardener Pets negotiable For questions, or to schedule private showing, please email this ad or call Jennifer at 404-906-5449. LOCATION: Mill Valley (address will be provided) CA DRE License 01905856. Progressive Property Group. 07/01/2013 Created on June 21, 2013 08:32 PDT

head: Castro/ Eureka Valley 2BR Victorian Condo in a Garden Setting
post: Dace@progressivesf.com This charming, tucked away urban retreat is situated in the center of Eureka Valley / Castro. This desirable neighborhood is lined with mature trees and beautifully maintained Victorian / Edwardian homes. This unique home, in a sunny and lively part of town, is within blocks of such landmarks as Dolores Park, the vibrant shops and restaurants of the Castro, and just over the hill from Noe Valley. World renown restaurateur Michael Bauers Top 100 restaurants are only blocks away: Delfina, Tartine Bakery, Frances, Chow, and the list goes onâŚ. 161 Hartford is a charming, San Francisco residence that has the ambiance of country living. It is a full, top floor, condominium in a Victorian cottage, detached on all 4 sides with the original faĂ§ade. It has it all - the turn of the century refined aesthetics yet also the sophisticated top of the line modern finishes throughout. Truly a gem! Amazing natural light everywhere thanks to the large skylights and windows on all 4 sides. Functional layout with a light filled living room and large windows overlooking the beautiful, tree lined courtyard. Wood burning fireplace is in the center of the floor plan, shared between the living room and the dining room. Charming, French Country style kitchen with direct access through French doors to the dining area. Back door off the kitchen will take you to a quiet, private balcony in a garden setting. Kitchen features ample counter and cabinet space, stainless refrigerator, dishwasher, disposal, gas stove and hood. Master bedroom is good in size with direct access to the full size bathroom. Bathroom features shower over tub, tiled floors and plenty of storage. Bathroom has been tastefully remodeled, modern and chic yet has the feel of a Victorian. Off the living room, there is a 2nd bedroom which can comfortably be used as an office, with plenty of natural day light. head: Large Apartment Close to Downtown
post: My husband and I will be working in the city come August and we are going to move to SF. Our lease isnt up until the last day of October so we are looking for someone to take over the lease or sign a new year lease. The nice thing about this lease is that it can be short or long term depending upon what your needs are. You can basically sign a lease until the end of October or a year lease. The kitchen and living rooms are spacious. Our bedroom comfortably fits a CA King Size bed. Our daughters room, the current nursery, is very large and is not much smaller than our room. Both rooms have walk in closets although one rooms walk in is larger than the other. The kitchen has an oven and a stove top and a dishwasher and microwave (all the standards). There is a lot of room for dishes and such in the kitchen. The hallway has a closet for storage. There is one bathroom that is a decent size. This apartment is one of the best in the complex in terms of light. There is a large window in the living room. It is a corner unit so there is only one wall where you share with neighbors. Deposit is $1500. You pay that to the management when you move in. Can be available by July 15th. Please reply with name and when you want the apt.

head: Top floor flat in the hills of Noe Valley with stunning views
post: Top floor flat available in a two-unit building located in the hills of Noe Valley on 24th Street (between Fountain and Grand View). The unit is on a steep hill, and offers beautiful views of the city with great natural light. The neighborhood is quiet and peaceful and within walking distance to all of the shops, restaurants, public transportation that 24th street has to offer. There are two bedrooms and one bath. The master bedroom has a big closet and loft space you can use for a bed or as a reading nook. There are vaulted ceilings with exposed beams, skylights in the kitchen and bathroom, original hardwood floors, and built-in bookshelves. The apartment comes with a one car garage (with additional storage space) and there is also plenty of street parking (no permit required). There is a shared backyard, a front-loading washer and dryer that is free to use, and an additional storage room that is shared for both units. Available July 15. for a one-year lease. One months rent + one months security deposit required at move in. Tenant pays water and garbage. Please email for questions or to make an appointment to see.

head: Modern, Spacious  4 BR /2BA Bernal Single Family Home â" PROGRESSIVE
post: Dace@progressivesf.com Modern, Spacious 4 BR /2BA Bernal Single Family Home â PROGRESSIVE A hip lifestyle in the sunny and lively part of town! Within blocks to Cortland Street shops, such as Good Life Grocery, Sandbox Bakery, restaurants. Also great for commuters with only minutes away from 280/101, Bay Bridge. 617 Tompkins is a very special one of a kind single family residence. The front faĂ§ade remains in its original 1907 architecture in combination with modern updates. Once you step inside, the modern finishes take over even more but the original style still remains. It has it all - the earlier century refined aesthetics, sophisticated San Francisco living with top of the line modern finishes throughout! Gracious exterior front stairs will lead you to the main entry door. 3 of the 4 bedrooms are on this main living level, 2 overlooking the street, 3rd the side garden. Further down the hall, one will find spacious, open floor plan living room / dining room combination, center island and kitchen. Further off the kitchen, at the back of the house, is a good size room that can either be used as a formal dining room, sunroom, playroom, home office and it has direct access to the side and back garden. Kitchen features ample counter top and custom cabinet space, dishwasher, disposal, gas stove and hood, refrigerator, and designer finishes. Wonderful floor plan to entertain! Also on this main living level there is a full size bathroom with shower over tub. Spiral stairs will lead you to the lower level of this of this amazing home which contains Master Suite with family room, and master bathroom which is tastefully renovated with extra deep soaking tub, shower and modern vanity, finishes. Lower level has a private entrance. head: We Cost Less, Look Better, & Have More! Save at least $1200 a Year!
post: My boss is crazy! He expects us to keep this place looking like the Taj Mahal and rent the apartments for below market prices at the same time. Youre going to save $100 a month OR MORE over the other guys apartments around here. If you pocketed an extra $1200 a year that would be enough to go on a cruise. I dont get a vacation because I have to spend a few hours each day keeping the men in the white coats from throwing a net over my crazy boss and dragging him to an institution. Designed by an award-winning San Francisco architect, the spacious, light-filled units have carpet, mini-blinds, central heat/air, dishwasher, outside storage, plus built-in oven, range and microwave. Some even have washer and dryer hookups! The park-like grounds have tranquil canals, fountains, and bridges running throughout the complex, which you can enjoy from your balcony or patio. Recreational facilities include a sports court, pool, spa, clubhouse and well-equipped fitness center. And we pay your water, sewer & trash which saves you an additional $55 to $85 a month or more! Conveniently located across the street from the well-stocked Village Oaks shopping center, and BART access is practically on our front steps. Its not even a block away from Highway 4 and just minutes from the 680. Give us a call at 925-228-0760 and if my boss tries to shove money into your hands, just ignore it, were losing enough as is!

head: Happy-to-live-in home in Noe Valley for July
post: We are renting a second floor apartment in Noe Valley for one month from July 7th to August 7th. It is a great place full of light; it serves as an excellent base for a San Francisco vacation. There are two bedrooms and one bathroom. The living room looks up to Twin Peaks, and you see Mt Diablo in the distance when looking out the window in the kitchen. Grrrreat view!! There is a gas stove, dishwasher, and microwave oven. Dishes and utensils are provided. Mourning doves and robins sing from treetops. Home is fully furnished with a queen bed in one bedroom, and a twin bed in the second bedroom. The living room sofa has a fold a bed within. Sheets and towels are provided. There is plentiful closet space. Floors are hardwood, kitchen is tiled. Washer and dryer are below the garage level in the back. Wood deck looks east, north, and south. Cheerful container gardens in front and in back showcase palms and succulents, fuchsias and lilies. There are a total of 19 stairs leading up to the apartment. There is free and easy street parking, usually within a block of the apartment. The apartment is walking distance to coffee stores, Whole Foods Market, and Saturday farmers market. The neighborhood is friendly and safe, quiet and respectful. It is located in the heart and middle of town -- by car, 25 minutes or less to anywhere in San Francisco. Walk down to the local video store on Castro Street to rent some movies, and hike up to the top of Twin Peaks to see the wildflowers. About nine minutes by car to Golden Gate Parks San Francisco Botanical Gardens. This is a great spot; youll have a happy and wonderful time here in San Francisco. Please contact Mr. Wang at (415) 824-4152 if you are interested in speaking with the manager, and renting this apartment for the month. Thank you. Details: Square footage: 750 square feet Food: Guests cook their own meals, call for take out, or go out. Laundry: Guests do their own laundry in facilities on site, or take clothes to the dry cleaners one block down the street. Bathroom One bath -- shower and tub One toilet and one sink Electronics Two flat screen TVs (19 & 30) with DVD and VCR capability. No cable, just basic digital TV through an antenna. DSL internet and wireless access. Bring a computer and plug it in. No land phone lines. Use cell phones. General suitability: No smoking No pets

If you feel the need to be active, try the XBOX. If you insist on leaving the great indoors, try a drink on the roof deck at sunset to start with. If you get hungry, North Beach is just half a block. And if you insist on going into work, the financial district is a nice 10 minute walk. We didnt just make the place comfy either. We made it greener. head: 2bd/1bth classic victorian, sunny, near mission, castro, dolores park
post: incredible location, full floor flat in a well maintained 2 unit building, classic edwardian victorian (built in 1895) on sanchez street, between 16/17th street. filled with sunshine, close to everything, 100 walk score, 2 blocks to K, L, M, N, J, F muni. easy access to 101, 280, 80. short walk to BART. close to every silicon valley shuttle bus (i used to take the ebay one! google, genentech, facebook, apple, paypal, linkedin, yahoo, all stop near here) FLAT DETAILS: - 2 bedrooms (13x14 w/large ceiling fan and 9x12 w/chandelier and big windows) - 1 bathroom with pedestal sink, clawfoot tub w/shower, chandelier, and wall cabinets - spacious 11 ceilings, chandeliers in living room, bathroom, and smaller bedroom, lots of natural light throughout - living room w/chandelier, added on electric fireplace, original windows, lots of sunshine - modern kitchen w/granite countertops and island, amazing brand new french door refrigerator, gas range, dishwasher (toaster oven, microwave could stay) - bright dining room surrounded by big windows and seating for 4-6 BACKYARD, GARAGE, STORAGE, PARKING: - gorgeous, BIG, sunny, landscaped (shared) backyard w/meyer lemon tree, rosemary, 3 colors of bouganvilla flowers, lavender, etc. - outdoor dining table w/seating for 6-8, propane gas BBQ, propane gas heater - free (full size machines) laundry in (shared) garage - 1 tandem parking spot in (shared) garage, room for a motorcycle and bicycle too. - lots of open storage space (4 full size metal shelves, large back nook) - private locked storage area (size of a small bedroom) - lots of street parking at school across the street after 5p NEIGHBORS, FOOD, FUN: - friendly neighbors and a semi-active block association - 3 blocks to dolores park, castro theatre, mission dolores - 2 blocks to castro, 2 blocks to the mission - dry cleaner (launderland), 2 coffee shops (cafe sophie, H cafe), sandwiches (ikes legendary sandwiches), sushi (eiji), california cuisine (kitchen story - soooo delicious!), new chinese restaurant are all within HALF BLOCK WALK. many many many many many more restaurants are within walking distance - safeway, 17/church corner store, and (soon to open) whole foods walkable as well! ***could be available fully or partially furnished, negotiable. note, pictures are from staging when the house was sold to me. actual furniture is now different and we can talk about what works best. Im being relocated out of state for a job, but LOVE this house and want to make sure its in good hands. This is an ideal space for 1-2 people to live and entertain. Im flexible on move-in date, but will need 2-3 months to transition to my new place. Available by Oct 1st at the latest. no smokers no pets 1 year lease, minimum credit/criminal/eviction check required water, trash, HOA, structure insurance, unit insurance included elec, gas, internet, cable, phone, renters insurance NOT included *****open house Saturday 6/29 and Sunday 6/30 from 10a-12p PDT***** *****please come with a check for 1 month rent ($4800) to hold the apartment, a separate check for $50 to run the reports, copies of 2 recent paycheck stubs, references, a short writeup about yourself, and whatever notes youll need with you to fill out rental application for credit/criminal/eviction check *****after approval, 1 month refundable security deposit, to secure apartment ($9600 incl 1st month rent) (note, showings are NOT this weekend, but next weekend, which is also PRIDE weekend so the neighborhood might be a little congested. its also the next time ill be in town. the street, honestly, is busy twice a year --- during PRIDE and halloween. otherwise, its very easy to walk TO the party, but the party doesnt come onto this street)

head: River View Penthouse Antioch River
post: One of the kind, spectacular river view - sit by the wall to wall window & enjoy the flows of the river to the Bay. You can even the river from the bed room the back deck. Walk to Amtrak train station - if you commute by train. Three shops on the first floor contributing to security of the building. No laud neighbors - the penthouse is the only residential rental in the area. Commercial/residential combo - use the huge living room with the river view for your business, and the rest of the Penthouse for personal. head: Small Unit Near Mac. BART/Piedmont Ave. Shops! See Sat @ 2PM!!
post: 3818 Ruby Street Oakland, CA 94609 Ruby Street has two charming 4-plexes next door to each other. These early 1950s buildings are far enough from the street to eliminate traffic noises. Each unit has a great deal of charm and character, and feature beautiful hardwood floors, large kitchens with a built-in tables, and walk-in closets. The apartments get a lot of light with windows on three sides. The Ruby Street Apartments have a great location, youre never far from what you need. Day to day items and groceries are nearby with Safeway and Piedmont Grocery Co both under a mile away, and MacArthur BART is just a short 10 minute walk. If you dont feel like cooking at home theres no shortage of restaurants, within four blocks youll find Korean, Japanese, Chinese, American, Seafood, Mexican and much more. When you need a pick me up SubRosa Coffee has the best espresso around. Or for those night owls you can grab a tasty appetizer and glass of wine at Marc 49.

The Irwin Cottages are located near everything you could need, Trader Joes, Safeway, and Whole Foods are all within walking distance, Ashby BART, UC Berkeley, and the Rockridge shopping district are a short drive or walk away. If you drive the opposite direction down Telegraph youll hit the Uptown District of Oakland which is home to the Fox Theater and a thriving night life. LISTING PHOTOS! head: Stunning Lafayette Home in Baywood Comm. Avail. 8/5 Premium Properties
post: $5,800 per month, 4 bedrooms, 3 full baths, 1 half baths, 4,437 square feet This home boasts gorgeous hardwood floors throughout, recessed lighting, crown moulding, dual pane windows, central vacuum, intercom system and vaulted ceilings. Hardwood entry with storage closets on each side of the door. Step down into the sunken formal living room, with hardwood floors, a woodburning fireplace and double doors to the backyard. The kitchen is gourmet and remodeled with marble countertops, skylights, stainless appliances including a Sub Zero refrigerator, Wolf 6 burner gas range, Miele dishwasher and oven, a built in microwave and trash compactor. There is a central island with bar seating in the middle of the kitchen and gorgeous white cabinets. Informal dining area inside kitchen with window seat. Formal dining room is off kitchen and is very spacious and very dramatic, with high ceilings, hardwood floors and a chandelier. A huge family room is next to the kitchen (step down into it) with hardwood floors, very high vaulted ceilings, a huge fireplace and a built-in bar. Doors from this room lead outside to a wooden deck area. Bedroom #1 is located downstairs and has neutral carpet and double doors leading out to the backyard. It has an attached bathroom with shower over tub. Across the hall is a guest bathroom (half bath). Upstairs is a landing area with storage cabinets. Laundry room is off this landing and has washer/dryer hookups and a sink. Bedroom #2 and bedroom #3 are very large, one is carpeted and one has hardwood floors. Both have wall closets and access to a shared full bath (Jack n Jill)with outer vanity area and shower over tub. There is an outer deck/balcony area which is accessible from the hallway. Gorgeous office/den with built-in shelves, a desk and a table with built-in cushioned seat. The master suite is amazing, with hardwood floors, a woodburning fireplace, a walk-in and mirrored wall closet and double doors out to a balcony with a view of the spectacular gardens in the backyard. Master bathroom has 2 separate vanity areas, each with its own sink, a sunken jacuzzi tub, a separate stall shower and the toilet is located in its own room. There is an attached 3 car garage with a large storage room as well, could be perfect for a hobby room! The backyard is unbelievable, you have to see it! It looks like an English garden, with patios, a fountain, pathways through the flowers and trees. Gardener included. Central heat & air. The home backs up to Briones Open Space. No smoking. Dog possible with owners approval and additional deposit. (No cats). Available Aug. 5th. Visit www.premiumprop.com for more information and call Robert Montgomery with Premium Properties to view. 925-998-8133

head: Beautiful House in Great Neighborhood
post: This is a spacious 1850 sf., 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom house, has vaulted ceilings and crown molding throughout. Bathroom has also been completely remodeled with new Jacuzzi tub, glass shower, sky lights, vessel sinks, granite countertop, and marble throughout. Hardwood floors throughout the living room, family room, and dining area. Has a 2 car garage, central air conditioning, along with a brand new roof and has just been repainted. This house is part of a community with a private community park. It also includes a clothes washer and dryer, and weekly gardener service. This house is centrally located with easy access to major freeways (237, 85, 101, & 280). Smokers or pets are not allowed.

head: Beautiful San Ramon Home is Avail. 8/3 Premium Properties
post: $3,575 per month, 4 bedrooms, 3 full baths, 0 half baths, 2,348 square feet available August 3rd! Award winning San Ramon Schools! Close to parks and shopping! Tiled floors at entry continue thru hall, bath, kitchen and family rooms. Gorgeous kitchen features center island, granite counters, double oven, microwave, gas range, garden window over sink and informal dining area. Adjoining family room has a wet bar, ceiling fan, brick wood-burning fireplace and slider leading to yard. Formal dining and living rooms are carpeted with high ceilings and a wood-burning fireplace. Full bath with step-in shower and good size bedroom located on lower level. Upstairs are where the remaining bedrooms are located and all are carpeted. Linen/storage cabinets and counter space at upper landing area. Master bedroom is very large with vaulted ceilings, over head fan, chair railing molding, sitting area and huge walk-in closet. Master bath features tiled floors, 2 sink vanity, separate soaking tub and step-in shower. Bedrooms 3 & 4 are both good size with ceiling fans and large closets. Hall bath has tiled floors, solid surface vanity and a shower-over tub. Laundry room located at entrance from garage and includes washer/dryer. Backyard is beautifully landscaped and features a covered deck, patio and lawn area. Gardener included. Central heat and A/C. No smoking. head: Lovely home in the Oakland Hills/1927 era-must see pics
post: This is a beautiful home (2850 sf) built in 1927 in the Redwood Heights district in the Oakland hills. The house retains the craftsmanship of the era and the ambiance is inviting and comfortable with a great view of San Francisco. It is a 2 1/2 stories (5 levels) with 2 fireplaces. Besides having vistas of the bay throughout the rooms facing the north and west, we have an incredible view from our large deck of the San Francisco Bay and both the Golden Gate and Bay Bridge. Partially furnished, including a baby grand piano and a pool table available for your use. No smoking. Deposit negotiable. Pet negotiable. Good credit required. Both the dining room and the living room with a fireplace face the bay and get ample sunshine. The master suite has a fireplace. Behind it is a sitting room/nursery/office with built-in filing drawers and bookcase. The master bathroom has a separate bath and shower. The shower has 2 shower heads. It is also a steam shower. The downstairs bathroom has a sunken bathtub. There is also a landing with built-in book shelves and cabinets. This space is suitable for an office/library/play room. Kitchen appliances include a Wolf gas range, Thermador oven, Bosch dishwasher, microwave, and a refrigerator. The kitchen leads down to a large, finished tiled basement with a TV/sitting room which leads to a larger room with a pool table. French doors lead out to the fenced, secure and private backyard. There is a separate laundry room with a washer/dryer. There is ample closet and storage space throughout the home. Public transportation is one block away; a direct route takes you to BART, 2.5 miles away. Walking distance to the Redwood Heights and Laurel Heights shopping communities is less than 1 mile. Glenview / Montclair / Piedmont are also close by. We are south of Berkeley, within 8 miles to UCB, closer to Mills and other academic institutions. This is a desirable location -- we have lovely neighbors and Redwood Heights is a great community. I have attached additional photos on the following link (below) to give you a better sense of the home. Please email me with any questions or you may reach me at 510-872-5341. I would be happy to discuss the various characteristics with you in greater detail. For more photos click onto

head: Beautiful furnished home in Noe Valley. ~ J.Wavro
post: Joanne Fazzino 415-297-9777 jf@jwavro.com San Francisco - Noe Valley - House for rent Rent: Pets: This This light and airy home is fully furnished and accessorized. It has a spacious feel from the moment you walk in.  There is an open floor plan to the remodeled kitchen, the living room with fireplace and the dining area. This room opens out to the patio and gorgeous backyard with a water fountain, pond and barbecue with lovely manicured plants and herbs. There is remote lighting and plenty of seating. Great place to entertain. The kitchen has stainless steel appliances with dishwasher, gas stove, a large refrigerator. The large island has plenty of storage and seats 3.  Every utensil imaginable is provided. Your comfort is guaranteed!   There is 1 bedroom and full bathroom on the first level. Walk up the stairs with iron railing that matches the stained glass windows (very special!) to the 2 master suites. One of the master bedrooms faces east with a view of Mt Diablo and Potrero Hill. This bedroom has a fireplace. Enjoy your morning coffee on the deck watching the sunrise. The bathroom en suite has a separate shower and deep soaking tub. The second master is called the Hawaiian Room --  very relaxing -- with another private deck and faces the water fountain and pond in the backyard. Easy transportation downtown with the J Church, plenty of busses and close access to 280 which swings around to 101 S if you need to get to Silicon Valley. There are plenty of great restaurants and coffee houses closeby.  Walgreens, Safeway and a SF Rec Center are very close as well.  Available around July 1, 2013. Term is negotiable. A pet will be considered. No smoking please.     Castro Street & Day Street, San Francisco, California Joanne Fazzino 415-297-9777 jf@jwavro.com

head: Bay view 1 br + den on Vallejo Steps ~ J.Wavro
post: Maureen DeBoer 415-519-1373 md@jwavro.com San Francisco - Telegraph Hill - Condo for rent Rent: Pets: Located on the Vallejo Steps, close to the top, between Kearney St. and Montgomery St.  This apartment is across from a garden landing with a spectacular view of the Bay. Classic San Francisco apartment with views of the City and Bay from kitchen, living room, den and bedroom.  Bay window and seat in the living room, lovely hardwood floors. Open kitchen with views to the east, granite countertops, built-in gathering table with chairs included. Home office, media room or den (not suitable as bedroom) with built in book shelves and freestanding fireplace for heat. Large bedroom in the rear, carpeted with large closet. The bedroom will easily fit a king-size bed. Full bath with shower over claw foot tub and Suntouch radiant floor heating. Unit is approx. 900 sq ft. Shared laundry in the building (no coins).  There are hook-ups for a washer/dryer inside the unit if you are willing to give up some closet space.  No parking.  Street parking is tight, but you can get a residential parking permit for the area.   This is a great area to live car-free. The Vallejo Steps are a landmark in San Francisco--a public sidewalk that was transformed by residents in to a beautiful garden path with terraced landings lined with houses, between the streets of Montgomery and Kearny in North Beach.  This location offers quick access to downtown on foot, bus or by car, and storied walks through the neighborhoods of North Beach, Telegraph Hill, Chinatown and the entire waterfront.  Some of San Franciscos best cuisine is found in North Beach, as well as famous gin joints such as Tosca and Specs. This is a very special apartment with lovely, friendly neighbors.   Cats are OK, no dogs please.  HOA of the building does not allow dogs. Available to lease during the month of June, but no later than July 1. Owners are looking for well-qualifed tenants with good credit and 3x rent in gross income.  To apply, you may download an application at www.jwavro.com. Vallejo Street & Kearney St., San Francisco, CA Maureen DeBoer 415-519-1373 md@jwavro.com

head: Incredible Large Lot in Private Location, Gated property- 925rentals
post: This home features 3 large bedrooms, a rec room as a forth room, 2 fully updated baths, 2 car garage, car port, and RV parking. The property boasts a good 2189 sq.ft of living space on this enormous half acres lot. Entrance to the home brings you many wonderful amenities and luxuries to such an open space home. Wonderful hardwood floors are connected from the kitchen to the living room and then to the family room with vaulted ceilings. The Master and other bedrooms are treated with wall to wall carpeting. Great open space Chefs kitchen includes an island, granite counter tops, matching granite back splash, double oven, double door refrigerator, electrical cook tops, built in microwave and abundance of cabinetry for storage. Renters should take advantage of the large backyard, good size grass field great for family funs, BBQ, and entertainment. Landscaping should be worry free as it is included in the rent. A block from the home gets you to Ygnacio, where freeways, BART and buses are close by for great easy commutes. Just minutes from Downtown Walnut Creek! The nearest schools are Buena Vista Elementary, Walnut Creek Intermediate and Las Lomas High School. A very lovely home! -Includes fridge, washer and dryer. -Gardening Service included. -Pets are upon approval. --- For information about this property, or to schedule a showing, please contact Leasing Agent Terry Karp of ParkOne Properties, at (925) 980-0006 or rterrykarp@gmail.com. head: 3 br available August 17th- w/hot-tub, high ceilings
post: AVAILABLE AUGUST 17 Current tenants move out August 15. Move in as early as August 17th. VIDEO TOUR: (from 2010 when unit was vacant (granite counter tops added since this video) longer newer video with furniture in it (the unit is not rented with furniture) MONEY STUFF rent 3300 deposit 3300 move in august 17 year lease landlord pays water, garbage, sewage tenant pays: pg&e;, phone, cable, tv (wifi is free but technically not included in lease) SELLING POINTS: Hot tub access (relax and have the jets on your back) Victorian features High ceilings Bay windows Large windows (natural light) You can see mt. tam from the dining room. Walk 2 BART Near major bus lines (51,72, SF commuter) Near strawberry creek park (w/café, yoga studio, etc). Washing maching (dishes) Stackable washer/dryer (cloths) Access to a small shared yard that has a hot-tub. Free wifi (technically not included in the rent. . . but available). NEIGHBORHOOD: Walking to BART, transit, park. Places to eat (over 10 resturaunts) including Your place Thai and Land Splitters. Near pubs (acme, albatross. . . and not too far from Missouri lounge) Places to buy food (several small grocery stores) Post office, cheese store, german food, chineese food, Pakistani food, Indian, thai, Italian, café. . .. . ... more Neighbors are a mix of new money and working class families. There is a youth center that get graffiti on the building at times. There are million dollar homes. There are shitty looking apartment buildings. There is tennis courts, basketball court, volleyball net. Bank, hardware store. Basically, the only thing I think you can not buy in the neighborhood is sheets and pillows. . . It got what you need. DESCRIPTION OF THE UNIT This second floor flat, as you enter it, you enter into a large dining room with a view of mt. tam. To the left is a large living room with a bay window and a small porch area. The master bedroom is off of the living room. It is on the large side and has a bay window. Off of the dining room is another normal sized bedroom with some build in storage areas. Off the dining room is also an entrance to the kitchen (which is on the small size). . . but the kitchen has a dishwasher, cabinets, stove, fridge, etc. . . just not tons of room. Off of the kitchen is another bedroom that is normal sized. And also off the kitchen is a hallway to the laundry area and the bathroom. The bathroom is a split bathroom (meaning there are two rooms. . . one with a shower and bathtub and sink in it. . . and a second with a toilet in it) That is nice for roommates can shower while somebody else uses the toilet, etc. There is also some stairs that go down to the small shared yard that has a hot-tub in it that is available. On the bottom floor, there are two 1 bedroom apartments that also have access to the shared yard and hot-tub. And there is an inlaw unit that has access to the yard and hot-tub too. Email me for more info or if you have any questions. OR you can call 510-686-3390 and ask for Todd (you can call 9am to 11pm) VIDEO TOUR: from 2010 longer video with furniture in it (not rented furnished) AVAILABLE AUGUST 17

head: 1890s VICTORIAN HISTORIC LANDMARK--ENTERTAIN FIRST CLASS! 2400 Sq Ft
post: This one of a kind 1890s Victorian historic landmark is a true showplace for formal entertaining with 11 foot ceilings and would be home to your antique furniture like no other! A formal Victorian living room greets you after the wallpapered foyer with chandelier. There is a formal dinning room, parlor/library room (or second master bedroom), large kitchen, breakfast room and second floor living room. There is a deck off the 2nd master bedroom with a view of the Berkeley hills. Its easy walking to the best shopping and restaurants. Berkeley Bowl and U.C. are close by. The home has two large ground floor rooms (one 200 sq ft and one about 350 sq ft) with separate entrances for office or other home based business use. The ground floor also has a full garage with shop space. It has a fully functional new yet historic kitchen with a $7000 six burner Victorian style stove. There is a beautiful breakfast room adorned by five stained glass windows, bathrooms include a new clawfoot tub, high mount water closet (yes the toilet high on the wall) and modern shower on second floor with victorian tile. There is state-of-the-art underfloor hydronic heat, hardwood floors and fenced backyard and garden shed and patio. The front yard is undergoing a facelift and has a beautiful 1890s wrought iron fence from Pennsylvania around the house with a rose garden soon to come. The house also has a fire sprinkler system and a burglar and fire alarm system. The home is in the final stages of a complete ground up $500,000.00 renovation restoring it to exact historic condition. These photos show the home near completion. All the trim is ornate, door knobs, hinges and plumbing fixtures all have beautiful Victorian detail. There are 8 antique 1890s gas/electric chandeliers (converted to electric) that are amazing. This building is nothing less than spectacular and we would like to find people that would love to live in a mint condition historic landmark! The building is being painted and landscaped now. This is possibly the most historically accurate and well preserved original home in Berkeley. It is one of Berkeleys oldest homes and has been declared a Historic Landmark. Were looking for a couple, a family or an individual, not a bunch of roommates. Its centrally located between Shattuck and Telegraph with easy access to UCB and downtown Berkeley as well as easy access to I-80 and San Francisco. Please email for more info and leave a number to call you back.
