head: Large Gorgeous Furnished Home, with Views- ReLISTO
post: The Home: This beautiful 5 bedroom, 4.5 bathroom single family home in the quiet neighborhood of Forest Hills has sweeping views of South San Francisco, Mt. Davidson, San Bruno Mountain and the Pacific Ocean. Nestled in the treelined street, this residence comes fully equipped with everything required to fully enjoy your stay in San Francisco. Rare to find amenities such as an outdoor hot tub, jacuzzi bath, formal dining room, and piano are just some of the great features. PHOTOS & click on Green Tabs: VIRTUAL TOUR: Main Level: The statley living room features a fireplace, television, built in speakers, WiFi, and baby grand piano. The formal dining room flows into the gourmet kitchen with updated gas appliances, kitchen island, two sinks, sub zero refrigerator and multiple appliances to create a wonderful meal. Enjoy your morning brew in the breakfast area adjacent to large window, fully appreciating the many sunny days granted to Forest Hill residents. Upstairs: The open, southern style staircase next to a multistory window, welcomes you to the Master Bedroom Suite. Featuring a king size bed, fireplace, walk in closet, and views of Southern San Francisco to start your day. The Master bath is adorned with tile, double vanity, jacuzzi tub and walk in shower. Lower Level: A game room, complete with pool table or ping pong table, balcony and its own bathroom are the perfect getaway from the day to day grind. Laundry, and garage parking are also on this level. Patio: The hot tub says it all. The patio is well protected by a wooden fence providing a restful backyard experience. If you feel like some gardening, there is an antique potting table at your disposal. Price includes all utilities, wifi, cable and alarm system. Price is based on a 3 month lease and may vary based on season and length of stay. KEY DETAILS - Family room can be converted to a 6th bedroom. We welcome Corporate Rentals also. Price based on season and length of term (and sometimes depending on furnished or unfurnished home). post: Shown by appointment only beginning next week with listing agent, Robin Spalding Vaccaro. Reply to craigslist email for more information and availability. $3,200 per month, 1 bedrooms, 1 full baths, 0 half baths, 662 square feet This beautiful FURNISHED Soma Grand one bedroom, one bathroom condominium has large windows in the living room and bedroom that show off the million dollar city views. This condo has Studio Becker cabinetry and quartz countertops. Soma Grand offers hotel-like services including twice-monthly housekeeping, complimentary Philz coffee & tea in the lobby, a DVD lending library, 24 hr. manned hotel-trained front desk staff & concierge. The staff is trained and ready to take care of every business or personal request on demand. From dinner reservations, car service, personal shoppers, a masseuse or a caterer, this San Francisco luxury condo property gives you access to only the best. The building has 24 hour security with a locked entry. The fifth floor community amenities include a complete fitness center, complimentary party/meeting clubhouse room w/media center to use for parties and meetings, a large outdoor spa, deck lounges and seating, a large dining table and community barbecue. All of this plus one car parking is included in the rent. Term - minimum 6 mo. to a max. of 1 year lease Security deposit - $4500 Twice-a-month housekeeping included in monthly rent Parking for one car in the Soma Grand garage is included in the monthly rent Landlord pays for the Soma Grand parking garage monthly parking and for the Soma Grand homeowners association monthly dues that include water, hot water, garbage, sewer, the twice-a-month house keeping, the use of the DVD lending library, the lobbys complimentary Philz coffee and tea, the use of the fifth floor parks community fitness center, Jacuzzi, deck area with fire pit, barbecue, lobby wifi and use of the community room. Tenant pays all utilities including the condos PG & E, Comcast cable, Internet, phone and any other services they may desire. No Pets Allowed No Smoking Allowed No Section 8 Accepted The fine print - Serious prospects must agree to give landlord an initial deposit check of $1000 that will be held uncashed until landlord approves their rental application and recent credit report with FICO score. All tenants must be on the lease contract and provide rental application information with personal and professional references and employment, income, job banking and current residence information to be considered. Listing agent will provide rental agreement and all other paperwork necessary for the transaction. Once approved, tenant agrees to sign and return the lease agreement paperwork no later than seventy two hours after receipt. If signed lease paperwork is not received within seventy two hours landlord may withdraw their offer to lease their property in writing to tenant. Upon receiving a fully executed ratified lease, the tenant agrees to bring a certified check for the initial rent and security deposit to landlords listing agent within seventy two hours. The agent will return the uncashed initial deposit check to the tenant at that time. Any delay with any of aforementioned steps by tenant may delay or jeopardize tenants opportunity to lease this rental. Addendum #1 will part of the lease. It includes among other things the landords house rules and the HOAs rules and regulations that all residents must abide by. Addendum #2 will also be part of the lease. It is the personal property inventory the landlord is leaving for the tenants enjoyment during the term of the lease. Any other details negotiated between landlord and tenant that isnt covered in the lease agreement or Addendum #1 or #2, will be written in an additional addenda if necessary. A copy of the blank rental contract, Addendum 1 & 2 and other disclosures are available upon to prospects upon request.

head: Amazing apartments - at a great low price!
post: The Place To Be! Escape to charming Novato with our quaint shops, expansive open space and key geographic locale - Marins northernmost city is the hub to hundreds of exciting activities. Create hundreds of exciting activities. Create your own adventure while experiencing the beauty and excitement of Novato. Millworks in Novato has taken the green building mission to a whole new level. This new project is one of the highest Green Point Rated buildings in the area. Using new, progressive and sustainable techniques, Millworks is setting a new standard with previously unheard of features, such as a living roof, dedicated bike storage and passive solar heating technique. That makes Millworks unsurpassed by any other development in the area. A Build it Green building that you will be proud to call home. Annual Events: -Novato Festical of Art, Wine, & Music - June -Infineon Raceway -NASCAR & NHRA -Downtown Farmers Market - April to September -Bike Night - May -Nostalgia Days - August -July 4th Parade -Marin County Fair - July -Concerts in the Park - June to September -Stafford Lake Labor Day Fireworks -Salsa Festival - September -Holiday Shopping & Events - December Local Amenities: -Peruse Old Towns shops and antiques -Hike forest trails and enjoy scenic vistas -Bicycle under historic oaks -Play a round of golf -Picnic in beautiful tree-lined parks -Observe birds and wildlife in preserves -Discover the natural beauty of state parks -Relax lakeside with a rod and reel -Explore historical museums and landmarks -Horseback ride through Indian country -Test your taste buds on world class wines -Choose from a variety of excellent restaurants Community Features: -Exercise and wellness room with state-of-the-art fitness facility (open 24hrs) -Social room with TV and Wi-Fi (reservable for parties or meetings) -Gorgeous rooftop garden featuring water fountains (with seating and night-lighting) -Whole Foods on site (delivers to our residents complimentary) -Underground parking (reserved spaces with individual bike hangers) -Controlled access (remote and key) -Recycling program -Concierge services -Smoke-free community -Walking distance to downtown restaurants and shops -Easy freeway access -Sinaloa Middle School and San Marin High School -Close to transportation Home Luxuries: -Tile flooring in entryway -Carpet rooms and living area -Bosch washer and dryer in every home (front-load, stackable) -Air conditioning -Cat-5 wiring throughout home -Energy-saving dual glazed low-E vinyl/aluminum windows throughout -Wall and ceiling insulation meets or exceeds Title 24 energy code -Granite slab kitchen counters -Bosch stainless steel gas range with microwave/hood combo -Bosch ENERGY STAR dishwasher -Kohler faucets -Marble slab vanity counters -Dual flush toilets -Alarm monitoring available -Linen closets -Ice maker -Storage cages available 1, 2, & 3 Bedrooms Available!! Our 1BD1BTH is located on our 4th floor rooftop garden. This home has a large patio that stretches the full length of the living room and the bedroom. Patio has gate doors for quick access to garden. It has an additonal tech area with computer connections. There are 3 long wall closets (2 in the bedroom and 1 near the entryway). The kitchen has all stainless steel appliances included, with plenty of cabinet space, overhead lighting, and a long bar area. The bathroom has a marble tub/shower with a glass door. Call today to schedule an appointment for a tour! Walk-ins welcome!! Directions: From Highway 101 exit De Long Avenue and go west. Entrance is on your right. post: Cats Dogs Description TEXT or EMAIL ONLY FOR A SHOWING.Managed by Laramar Apartments Lease Terms 1 Year Lease Required Amenities Hardwood Floor Walk In Closet Additional Photos $1,295 /month Contact Bay Area Rental Advisors Maggie Volk (415) 806-1173 Map About Tenderloin The Tenderloin is a neighborhood undergoing rapid transition. It is centrally located with affordable rents. The blocks closest to Market Street tend to be gritty with a fair share of homeless. However, the rest of the area has some nice pockets, with the best being closest to Nob Hill. Overall, the neighborhood is well located in SF and its popular among art students since you can find decent studios for reasonable prices. Its close to the theaters, Union Square, and there are some tasty ethnic restaurants. Photo by: Wikipedia User Aude

head: Cottage in Kensington
post: This unique cottage is available for the first time in nine years. Built in the 1930s, it was the original house on the property, at the extreme back of the lot far from the street. The cottage is private and quiet, and surrounded by mature camellias, bougainvillea, fruit trees, etc. A brick patio separates the two buildings and leads into the basement area of our house, in which are a shared washer and dryer. Also included in the rent are PG&E;, water, and garbage. Although the bedroom is rather small, the kitchen is big and sunny, ceilings are high, and there is a large enclosed porch in front of the living room, providing extra space (161 sq. ft., unheated) and privacy. The bathroom has a stall shower (no tub). We have just renovated parts of the kitchen, preserving the pebble mosaics by the original owner. The neighborhood is wonderful--quiet, safe, convenient. We are one block away (via pedestrian path) from the Arlington Ave. shops, the #7 bus to Berkeley, and the express bus to San Francisco. Ten minutes drive to UC Berkeley or El Cerrito Plaza BART. Parking is adequate, on the street. No dogs. Please call Phil or Ann, (510) 527-4847.

head: Fully Furnished Home FOR 1 MONTH (Jul 2-Aug 2)

Located within 4 miles of Stanford University, the home offers easy access to 101 and 280. The house includes a connected living cum dining room/cum kitchen area, a fenced-in small backyard with a patio, and is equipped with big and small appliances and linens. Living area is 1200 Sq ft., and lot size is about 6600 sq. ft. Room sizes average 10x10 sq.ft. The carport and driveway can accommodate a total of 3 cars. Highspeed internet,/cable TV, and gardener services are included in the rent ($4500). Utilities (water, electricity, gas, garbage collection) are extra and cost from about $250-450 per month. The home is ideal for visiting faculty or relocating executives and families. No pets or smokers please. Kindly note the home can be rented on a furnished basis only. Contact us for photos or to schedule a viewing.

head: Fantastic Location! A Spacious Apartment is Waiting for You!
post: The Place To Be! Escape to charming Novato with our quaint shops, expansive open space and key geographic locale - Marins northernmost city is the hub to hundreds of exciting activities. Create hundreds of exciting activities. Create your own adventure while experiencing the beauty and excitement of Novato. Millworks in Novato has taken the green building mission to a whole new level. This new project is one of the highest Green Point Rated buildings in the area. Using new, progressive and sustainable techniques, Millworks is setting a new standard with previously unheard of features, such as a living roof, dedicated bike storage and passive solar heating technique. That makes Millworks unsurpassed by any other development in the area. A Build it Green building that you will be proud to call home. Annual Events: -Novato Festical of Art, Wine, & Music - June -Infineon Raceway -NASCAR & NHRA -Downtown Farmers Market - April to September -Bike Night - May -Nostalgia Days - August -July 4th Parade -Marin County Fair - July -Concerts in the Park - June to September -Stafford Lake Labor Day Fireworks -Salsa Festival - September -Holiday Shopping & Events - December Local Amenities: -Peruse Old Towns shops and antiques -Hike forest trails and enjoy scenic vistas -Bicycle under historic oaks -Play a round of golf -Picnic in beautiful tree-lined parks -Observe birds and wildlife in preserves -Discover the natural beauty of state parks -Relax lakeside with a rod and reel -Explore historical museums and landmarks -Horseback ride through Indian country -Test your taste buds on world class wines -Choose from a variety of excellent restaurants Community Features: -Exercise and wellness room with state-of-the-art fitness facility (open 24hrs) -Social room with TV and Wi-Fi (reservable for parties or meetings) -Gorgeous rooftop garden featuring water fountains (with seating and night-lighting) -Whole Foods on site (delivers to our residents complimentary) -Underground parking (reserved spaces with individual bike hangers) -Controlled access (remote and key) -Recycling program -Concierge services -Smoke-free community -Walking distance to downtown restaurants and shops -Easy freeway access -Sinaloa Middle School and San Marin High School -Close to transportation Home Luxuries: -Tile flooring in entryway -Carpet rooms and living area -Bosch washer and dryer in every home (front-load, stackable) -Air conditioning -Cat-5 wiring throughout home -Energy-saving dual glazed low-E vinyl/aluminum windows throughout -Wall and ceiling insulation meets or exceeds Title 24 energy code -Granite slab kitchen counters -Bosch stainless steel gas range with microwave/hood combo -Bosch ENERGY STAR dishwasher -Kohler faucets -Marble slab vanity counters -Dual flush toilets -Alarm monitoring available -Linen closets -Ice maker -Storage cages available 1, 2, & 3 Bedrooms Available!! Our 2BD2BTH is a corner home located on our 3rd floor with oversized retail windows that have a beautiful southwest view of city and Novatos rolling hills. This home gets lots of sunlight in bedrooms, living, and dining area. It has large open kitchen, living, and dining area. Call today to schedule an appointment for a tour! Walk-ins welcome!! Directions: From Highway 101 exit De Long Avenue and go west. Entrance is on your right. Millworks Apartments 900 Reichert Avenue Novato, California 94945 (855) 248-9321 www.MillworksNovato.com

head: For Rent -- HONEYMOON COTTAGE - El Cerrito Hills.   Two Bedrooms
post: Honeymoon Cottage is situated on a half acre lot with tall trees and a gentle creek running through the property. It is secluded and private and it has a special charm. This is a view lot. The Living Room window is appointed with a four-panel rice paper shoji screen and it looks on to a Japanese Garden with large stones, a dwarfed-leafed Japanese Maple and a Blue Spruce. This large lot has many tall mature pines trees. It has a charming creek that runs all winter... with a small bridge to access a tree-filled yard. This is truly an exceptional find and will not last. One large bedroom and the other can second as your own private home office. The bathroom has a new full-sized bath tub, new vanity, new toilet and shower. New everything!! Note: This is NOT an apartment but a private house. There are no common walls to hear neighbors and their noise. This is as close as it comes to finding a country home right in the city! All exterior walls are insulated and windows and doors are as well. Energy conservation was give great consideration when the unit was renovated. Deposit, credit check and references are required. No Section 8 please. NO Pets, non-smokers. Approximately 870 square feet. Single level. $2085 per month. One year lease required. To inquire, please email. The unit is ready to rent now.

head: Affordable Housing for Seniors 62+
post: Affordable housing for seniors Lesley Terrace (formerly known as Bonnie Brae Terrace) has affordable, studio apartments available for adults 62+ years of age who have incomes at or below $63,350 per year. Rent and fees for the 300 sq foot Studio begin at $782- $880 per month (depending on the view) and include a mandatory meal program (breakfast and dinner, Monday through Saturday, breakfast and brunch on Sunday); and basic utilities (except telephone and television). Larger Studios (called Alcoves) and One Bedroom Apartments also available. Please call for current prices. Amenities include an on-site beauty salon; mini-mart; library; laundry facilities; enriching, resident-run activities; and a computer lab with high-speed internet access, plus WIFI in the East and West Lounges. (Lesley Terrace is not licensed to provide personal care services, but a social services coordinator is available to help you find help at home, if needed.) Lesley Terrace is owned and operated by Lesley Senior Communities, a non-profit organization. The property is nestled in the green hills of Belmont, yet is just a short walk to the local shopping center, grocery store, public library and two hiking parks. Sam Trans provides bus service via Routes 260, 262, 295, 390, 391 and the Redi-Wheels program. For more information or to schedule a tour, please call (650) 593-1818 during our business hours of Monday through Friday 9:00 am - 4:00 pm. We are happy to give drop in visitors a tour of our common areas during business hours; but to see an actual Studio, a reservation is required. The next tours that include a Studio will be Tuesday, June 25th at 1:30 pm and Thursday, June 27th at 1:30 pm. Space on the tours is limited, so please call to make a reservation at your earliest convenience. We look forward to meeting you and showing you our lovely community! Equal Housing Opportunity

head: Beautiful Spanish Home with Loads of Charm!!
post: Available June 1st!!!! This Gorgeous 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath House was built circa 1937 and truly reflects the Spanish Mediterranean Style Architecture of the Period with high ceilings and lots of windows. Its located in the desirable Lower Vista / St. Basils Neighborhood. Youll feel welcomed to walk through the intimate brick paved courtyard with a Tiled Lion-head wall fountain surrounded by mature Palm Trees, Flowering Vines, and Bird of Paradise before reaching the arched front door. As you enter this Beautiful home, youre greeted by an inviting entryway into the living room with 3 large arched bay windows overlooking the Spanish courtyard. There is hardwood floors, handmade wrought iron light fixtures, and a cozy fireplace. There is another arched entryway into the large formal dining room with views of the courtyard. The kitchen and the breakfast nook are all original, except for the track lighting and the Frigidaire Gallery series stainless steel appliances. The Bedrooms are spacious with mini walk-in closets and views of the large brick paved Backyard. Throughout the seasons, you can entertain / relax in the front or the backyard listening to the water fountain or sipping fresh lemonade from the prolific Lemon tree as you watch the palm trees dance in the wind. This is your opportunity to enjoy a Beautiful Home that was truly designed for Fine Living inside our out. Willing to consider a reduced deposit with excellent credit & references.

Large studio with giant walk in closet
post: I live in the heart of Hayes Valley, but on one of the quieter side streets. The unit is on the second floor of a six floor building, 48 units total. There are 2 coin-op washers and dryers on the ground floor. Its a fairly large studio that I furnished with a queen bed, full-length couch and desk. There is a full separate kitchen that can fit a table for 4, gas stove, dishwasher and full-size fridge. The bathroom has shower over tub. The best part is a walk in closet that can technically fit a queen size bed, making it a jr one bedroom. Some of my neighbors use theirs as an office. West facing windows provide great light and fresh air; they look out onto a school playground so maybe not ideal if you work from home. There is a garage in the building, but currently there are no available parking spots. There are some surface lots nearby with monthly rates though. Also, its a pet friendly building. I didnt have a pet, so cant tell you how much the deposit is. The unit is available the first week of July. Im sorry I have no pictures of the unit unfurnished, but might be able to get them if you need. I am in the process of packing, but am available to show the unit on the Saturday. I am only a tenant. If you decide to apply, you will be dealing with the building manager.

head: Very Spacious Two bedrooms With Washer n Dryer
Amazing One Bedroom With YARD! Only One Available
August Move in. Enjoy Summer in Your new Apartment Home
$675 Come live with two straight professional
post: We are 24 and 28, and are looking for someone to fill a soon-to-be vacant room. You would be free to move in around the beginning of July. We are looking for someone to fill the spot soon, so please dont respond if you want to move into the place in August. The deposit is $200 and the lease runs through November, I believe. The room is medium-sized, which fits a queen bed and desk with some room to spare. We all share one bathroom, but Im fortunate enough to have a half bath in my room. Im only in that bathroom to shower. The place is pretty clean. Unfortunately, our roommate is taking his couches so if you have a couple thatd be great. Utilities run about 75-90 per month, as we have to pay for PGE, water/garbage, cable/internet... We are looking for someone in their twenties. We are a couple of guys so it would probably be easier with another. We would like someone with a similar schedule. Most likely going to go with a professional 9-5 type. We are clean, respectful, quiet when needed, and responsible. We party on the weekends but dont go crazy during thr week. An occasional weekday party night is cool but that would never be a weekly thing. We absolutely need those qualities in a roommate. We are into sports and the TV is stuck on ESPN or some game most of the time. We occasionally go out together downtown but we dont want a socially dependent person. Thats not to say we dont want a friend. If that works out, great. We are very easy going. No heavy drug users or cigarette smokers please. We are 420 friendly and drink, but not to excess. We live at the Cypress Creek apartments. Its open parking so if you get home before 7, you should find a spot. Theres also street parking but weve had to do that once or twice. On site laundry thats card operated. Email me if you want some pics and tell me about yourself. My phone is attached to my hip so I respond fairly quickly. Thanks for looking!

head: Beautiful Mission Studio w/ Building Manager Opportunity!
post: $1,795 per month, 0 bedrooms, 1 full baths, 0 half baths, 0 square feet You will be living in a remodeled studio apartment on-site and will be provided with all necessary supplies for jobs, but not tools. You will be responsible for the day-to-day maintenance of 14 residential units, the common areas, and exterior of the premises. In addition, you will need to take on small projects to help our crew finish renovations in a timely manner. You will be signing a lease for $1,795 a month for the apartment. You will pay rent each month for your apartment. At the end of each month you will receive a check for your management services for $500. Tenants from the building will not directly contact you for maintenance issues, but instead report all issues to the management company. The management company will then contact you for appropriate repairs. If the repair is beyond your scope of work, our maintenance staff will take care of the issue. This is not an employment position. You will be acting as an independent contractor. As such, you will be responsible for your own scheduling, provision of any necessary tools, etc. You will be paid a monthly fee for your services. As an independent contractor, you will be responsible for your own income reporting and you will not be entitled to unemployment benefits should the contract be terminated. Most frequent maintenance fixes:  Bringing trash bins from the back to the front of the building for pick up  Crushing cardboard boxes in garbage area  Fixing leaky p-traps/faucets and running toilets  Clogged Drain Fixes  Touch-up paint in hallway About the Apartment: The apartment has been completely remodeled with fantastic modern touches. Located in San Franciscos lively, eclectic Mission District, youll be within walking distance to dozens of shops, wonderful restaurants, the Valencia corridor. Apartment Features Include:  Fully-Renovated Kitchen with New Cabinets and Granite Counters  Stainless Steel Appliances in Kitchen  Renovated Bathroom with New Fixtures and Hardware  Large Closets Building Features Include  Secure, Gated Access  Classic Architecture Dont miss this opportunity to live in one of San Franciscos most popular, lively neighborhoods. head: 2Ba-GreatWestCuptLocale/7Pools/Streams/FP/WD/Granite/Spa/GEApps
One Hawthorne: Furnished or Unfurnished, Avail July
post: One Hawthorne: 645 Howard Street #17F When your new home is at One Hawthorne, you have one of the most commanding views of San Francisco. From Twin Peaks to Sutro Tower across the city skyline to the top of the SF MOMA--your new outlook is nothing less than simply spectacular. In this corner 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom home, you may choose to enjoy the views from the comfort of your couch or al fresco on your balcony or terrace. Either way, the net effect is nothing less than transformative. The spacious living area is unlike most condominiums or apartments. With near floor-to-ceiling glass surrounding two corners, the indoors and outdoors become one. Designer upgrades include exquisite hardwood floors, custom light fixtures, window treatments. The highlight is a sky view balcony that provides a seamless opportunity to take in the skyline. Enjoy cocktails or morning coffee as you overlook the city. Whether you use your kitchen primarily as a social space or as a traditional cooking venue, great beauty, refinement and technological efficiency are all built right in. This chefs kitchen offers the finest appliance suites, beginning with Bosch gas cooktops and ovens, Sub-Zero refrigerator, microwave ovens. The heart of your home is clad with beautiful natural grey polished quartzite countertops, stone backsplashes, signature white acrylic Studio Becker soft-close cabinets, and polished chrome Watermark fixtures. The master bedroom is perfectly appointed with hardwood floors, Hunter Douglas window treatments, a walk-in closet with organizers, and access to a second outdoor deck. Your master bath looks and feels like your own personal spa. Designed with natural stone tile and accented with Kohler fixtures, the master bath is a place to cleanse and refresh, invigorate and relax. Your master bath offers a separate tub and glass-enclosed shower and dual vanities. Enjoy world-class amenities in your high-rise home. An on-site fitness center with cooling terrace, 4,000 square foot roof terrace, doorman and concierge services, are among some of the many building amenities. If location really is everything, One Hawthorne has it all. Rising graciously above the vibrant and fashionable downtown San Francisco, One Hawthorne residents benefit from close proximity to fabulous shopping in Union Square, the finest dining, and attractions at The Metreon, and nightlife. The convenient downtown location connects you to major local and regional transportation assuring an easy commute to virtually anywhere in the Bay Area. Everything you want or need is just minutes away. This level of lifestyle underscores a fresh urban neighborhood attitude in which people work, study, play, shop, and eat close to home. This 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom condo at One Hawthorne is available unfurnished for $7,500 (12 month lease term) or furnished for $9,500 (3-12 month lease terms).  1,330 sq. ft. (per owner)  Poliform sofa, chairs, and bed in guest room DRE# 01369396 DRE# 01875716

head: Charming 1-2 BR apt on Nob Hill with Views of GGB
post: This is a bright and charming 1-2 BR top-floor apartment in a 6-unit Victorian building atop Nob Hill with Golden Gate Bridge views from the bedroom and living room windows. Vista includes Russian Hill and Telegraph Hill. The apartment includes: 1 bedroom 1 living room (with decorative fireplace) 1 formal dining room (built-in china cabinet) 1 kitchen (with marble counter-top, gas stove and built-in cupboard) 1 bathroom The living room can be used as a second bedroom or study. The apartment is full of Charm: with Victorian wall trimmings, decorative fireplace, bay windows and built-in China cabinet and cupboard. head: Beautiful House in Great Neighborhood
post: This is a spacious 1850 sf., 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom house, has vaulted ceilings and crown molding throughout. It has a separate living room, family room, formal dining area, and a large bonus room (10 x 21) that can be used as a third bedroom, however best suited for an office, or storage area. There is a water fall leading into a Kio pond in the atrium located in the center of the house, which is open to the dining area and second bedroom. Marble gas fireplaces in living room and master bedroom make it cozy in the winter. Kitchen has been completely remodeled with new stainless steel appliances, cork floor, and granite countertops. Bathroom has also been completely remodeled with new Jacuzzi tub, glass shower, sky lights, vessel sinks, granite countertop, and marble throughout. Hardwood floors throughout the living room, family room, and dining area. Has a 2 car garage, central air conditioning, along with a brand new roof and has just been repainted. This house is part of a community with a private community park. It also includes a clothes washer and dryer, and weekly gardener service. This house is centrally located with easy access to major freeways (237, 85, 101, & 280). Smokers or pets are not allowed.

head: Fully Furnished Executive Rental in Upscale Area
post: All you need to move in is your personal belonging. This beautiful home is fully furnished and even the kitchen is fully stocked with dishes and cookware, wine glasses, toaster... Perfect for relocating executives at only $200 per night. Upon entering the house, you will arrive in an inviting light filled living room with a fireplace. Up the staircase, youll find the rest of the house. Spacious family room with a fireplace and sliding doors to the beautiful and serene backyard. Light and bright formal living with views of Oak studded surrounding hills. Large newly remodeled kitchen with granite counters, stainless steel sink and stove and double oven, and microwave and large refrigerator. Breakfast nook. Down the hall, there is the powder room or half bath. Master bedroom consists of two bedrooms, approx. 600 sqft. with Bay Windows. One room is being used/furnished as office. Large master bath with jetted tub and separate shower, double sink. Two large closets; walking closet and a three door mirrored door additional closet. Two additional light and bright bedrooms with nice size closets and views of the hills. One bathroom with double sinks and shower over tub. Laundry room with washer and dryer. Beautiful peaceful yard fully landscaped with grass and fountain, and different patios and sitting areas. The yard is completely private and is surrounded by peaceful hill and view of Mt. Diablo and plenty of wild life, birds.. visiting all day long. Serenity abounds. Central heating and cooling. Shutters on most windows. Cathedral ceilings. Two car garage. The house is fully furnished and towels and bedding are also provided for all rooms and bathrooms. Prefer a one year lease but will consider shorter term. No smoking and no pets. Good credit, verifiable income/employment is required. Security deposit is required. Tenant will pay all utilities. BART is a ten minutes ride. San Francisco (SF) is half hour on BART or with no traffic its approx. 40 minutes drive. Golf course is available down the street from the house, but its not a part of this community. head: ] Work for or do business with Contra Costa County? You should live he
post: Martinez is a delightful community and the seat of Contra Costa County. All of the County offices and services are located here. If you need to be in Martinez on a regular basis then you really ought to live here, and weve got the place for you: Simply put, we offer the most elegant Studio, 1 & 2 BR apartment homes around at prices too good to pass up. Were already $100 a month less than our competition, and we pay your water, sewer & trash which saves you an additional $55 to $85 a month or more! Designed by an award-winning San Francisco architect, the spacious, light-filled units have carpet, mini-blinds, central heat/air, dishwasher, outside storage, plus built-in oven, range and microwave. Some even have washer and dryer hookups! The park-like grounds have tranquil canals, fountains, and bridges running throughout the complex, which you can enjoy from your balcony or patio. Recreational facilities include a sports court, pool, spa, clubhouse and well-equipped fitness center. Conveniently located across the street from the well-stocked Village Oaks shopping center, and BART access is practically on our front steps. The new Amtrak station will take you to Sacramento fast, but if you want to drive were not even a block away from Highway 4 and just minutes from the 680. Give us a call at 925-228-0760

Conveniently Located at 1494 Solano in Albany (just three doors down from Safeway), we currently have some of our bright and cozy one bedroom apartments available for move in on July 1st and July 15th. (possibly sooner if you need it before then)! Solano Avenue offers great shopping, dining and entertainment along with a safe neighborhood atmosphere all steps outside of your apartment. This building is only two miles from UC Berkeley and a short distance from several BART stations all of which can be easily accessed by AC Transit line 18 which runs along Solano Avenue. Freeway access is also very quick and easy; this building is in the perfect East Bay location to meet all of your commuting and travel needs. The rent for the apartments range from: $1,175 for third floor unit $1,150 for second floor unit $1,100 for ground floor unit The security deposit is $1,650 Credit checking fee is $25 Water and garbage are included in the rent. Plenty of street parking is available, parking inside the building may also be available for an additional charge added to monthly rent. Sorry, no section 8. The pictures shown are not the exact apartments currently available, but all of our one bedrooms are identical in size and layout, they just vary slightly in carpets and finishes.

post: This is a Spacious 3 Br 1 Bath 1040 Square Foot Flat that has been completely remodeled. It has a separate living room, a large Bathroom, Granite countertops & a large eating area in the diningroom. Floorplan available as .pdf to serious applicants. Ideal for Academics as UC Berkeley is a short bike ride away. This Flat is on the top floor of a completely remodeled 1890s Queen Anne Victorian . It has a small shared back yard garden with Flowers & Bamboo. There is also a large sunny, fenced in shared patio space. One of the key things that distinguishes this Flat is the quiet and friendly neighborhood where people know & watch out for each other. We have gotten to know most of the neighbors on this block during the renovation and we feel the neighborhood is great. Lots of parking on the street, usually in front of house and no permit required. Very conveniently located on the Border of North Oakland and Berkeley in the lovely Emeryville MicroClimate. Near UCBerkeley, Trader Joes, Berkeley Bowl, BART & Emeryville BioTech. Special touches make this flat Nice and Homey, including: Very Lovely Natural Light. Roomy bathroom with all new fixtures . Tiled Kitchen with New Sink, Cabinets, Granite Counter tops. Dishwasher & Built-In Microwave Oven. Washer & Gas dryer hook-ups. Real Oak Hardwood floors throughout for warmth and charm, Premium Energy Star Sound Reducing Windows for quiet comfort. Cute terracotta tiled front step. Large Closets. Interior trim in Victorian / Bungalow inspired style. Efficient programmable gas furnace central heating. All New Plumbing & Electrical, all Lead Free plumbing. Fully wired for Network (CAT5e), Internet, Cable & Phone. Available 1 August 2013. Available for viewing by appointment only. Requires Credit Check, FICO score of 675 or above, $2500 security deposit and a 1 year lease. All residents must be on lease. Owners pay garbage, tenant pays water and PG&E.; As per California Civil Code ยง1947.5, The entire building is a Non Smoking Building which does not permit smoking anywhere on the property. head: The Apartment, The Building, and the Location!
Stainless Steel Appliances & Granite Countertops! Great Location!
Beautiful 1brm in the Best Nieghborhood in Oakland Available JULY 1.
post: So, heres the deal. I would like to be able to break my lease, and do it by July 1st. This is where you come in. The rent will be around 2200 per month with a private parking spot included, which is a good deal considering the neighborhood. And right off the bat, let me say that the landlord will not allow pets of any kind that are mammalian. Sorry. I thought it was lame, too, but when i saw the spot i made the compromise. The apt: Huge one bedroom, around 1500 square feet. Cool bathroom, the tub and shower are separated. Lots o storage space. Laundry on site. Hers/His closets in bedroom. Really cute, actually. Huge dining room, large windows. Monstrous living room with operable fireplace, large windows. Even bigger outdoor patio that gets great sunlight. Did i mention that the upstairs neighbors are pretty badass? Turn of the century building, which means amazing hardwood floors, high ceilings with ornate crown moldings- and the fireplace is even more intricate. I just installed a raised garden out front and had specialized soil (a la merde) delivered for growing vegetables. Take my word, it will cause your veggies to grow so fast you prob should never stand in it for fear of being impaled by some fast upshoot tomato plant or radicchio stem. Seriously. But not really. It is really good soil, though. Paid a LOT to get it here. And you get it for FREE!! And did i mention its in probably the safest, quietest neighborhood in Oakland, just steps away from the lake and your next run resplendent with flocking geese and the bright Oakland sun reflecting off the lake warming your face and soul as you realize how freakin much you love your new apt and the area!!! Did i mention that? Anywho, the reason i want out is that my fiancee and i split after getting the place to settle down in. Alas, the memories. Alas, i want to be back near all mee buddies in San Francisco. It goes on, but not here. All i want you to do is email me, serious inquiries only, to set up a time to come look at it. I work a LOT, so i wont respond immediately. Dont take this personally or get worried. Anyone is capable of having this spot, but i know the landlord would like someone with credite excellente! Even better references! She likes couples, too. Apparently they are like......more reliable or something. Go figure. The deposit is 4000.00 smackeroos. So, the move in would be around 6300.00. And, if you like, you could buy my huge sectional couch i bought specifically for this apt. I paid 1300 for it. You could pay 600.00. Its literally 8 mos old, and pretty much never gets used because i avoid home as much as possible due to the aforementioned dissolution of....etc. Exeunt!!

head: Spectacular 3 Bedroom Penthouse with Panoramic Views at Axis
post: $6,750 per month, 3 bedrooms, 2 full baths, 0 half baths, 1,769 square feet Views, views, views, as far as the eye can see. As you enter this brand-new corner unit, youll be immediately struck by the floor-to-ceiling windows with unobstructed views from the HP Pavilion, to the runways of San Jose Mineta International Airport, to the Eastern foothills. You can even see the new 49er Stadium in the distance. And in the evenings gorgeous sunsets will take your breath away. You can enjoy these views on one of the largest wraparound balconies in all of Axis. The kitchen is a cooks dream. Beautiful ceiling-height cabinets afford plenty of storage. The granite slab counters include a full granite backsplash. And the appliances are top-of-the-line: stainless steel Viking gas cooktop, oven, and microwave; paneled Sub-Zero refrigerator; and paneled Bosch dishwasher will make cooking and cleaning a pleasure. And there is a large pantry closet for more storage. Warm hardwood floors can be found in the entry, hallways, living area, and kitchen. Recessed and upgraded lighting, including energy-saving ceiling fans, can be found throughout the unit. The master bedroom features plush carpeting, a large closet with plenty of storage space, and views of the HP Pavilion. The spacious master bathroom has a dual-sink vanity with a granite counter and dual linen towers, a separate tub and shower, both with upgraded ceramic tile surrounds. The shower features a frameless glass shower door. The second and third bedrooms also have plush carpeting and large closets, including a walk-in closet. The second bath has a tile floor, granite counter, linen tower, and a tile surrounded shower over tub. In addition, the condo has a separate den, perfect for a home office, and a separate laundry room with storage cabinet. The condo comes with two dedicated parking spaces in the secured underground garage. Axis is the epitome of upscale urban living. Its conveniently located near everything downtown San Jose has to offer - great restaurants, vibrant nightlife, sports and concerts at the HP Pavilion, world-class theater, and seasonal entertainment and special events. Amenities abound at Axis - concierge service, fully-staffed, round the clock security, a modern fitness center, and an outdoor pool, hot tub, and barbeque area. Transportation options are many - San Joses Diridon Station is blocks away with Caltrain and VTA Light Rail options, and highways 87, 880 and 280 are minutes away by car. Be the envy of your friends. Be at Axis. Š 2013 Silicon Valley Residential Realty, Inc.

post: (415) 533-6680 Gorgeous, Two-Story Home in Beautiful Hillsborough! This gorgeous 6 bedroom, 6 bathroom house is located in the highly desirable city of Hillsborough, situated between the Crystal Springs Golf Club and the Burlingame Country Club. Great for a family and conveniently located just blocks from North Hillsborough Elementary School and Crocker Middle School. This beautiful, two-story home features all your comforts and amenities, including electronically gated driveways and large windows for an abundance of natural light. The first floor offers hardwood floors throughout and spacious living areas for the entire family, including a formal dining room, den, and two living rooms with fireplaces. There is a large gourmet, eat-in kitchen, featuring an island range and hood, breakfast bar, and plenty of cabinet and storage space. The first floor also includes a bedroom, two full bathrooms, steam room, and direct access to the three-car garage and large backyard. The top floor features five large, carpeted bedrooms and four full bathrooms, including a large master bedroom with ample closet space and a luxury master bathroom with a large Jacuzzi tub and shower. The large bedroom windows provide an abundance of natural light to accentuate the beautiful scenic views of the city. The large driveway fits approximately 10 cars. Plenty of storage is available in the attic and two storage units. Easy access to Highway 35 (Skyline Blvd.) and I280. Pet ok with deposit. Available approximately June 15th. head: 2BR2BA VIEW CONDO IN SOUTH BEACH
post: This is a corner unit with hardwood floors throughout. It has two full bedrooms and two full baths. One of the baths has a tub and the other has a shower. There is a modern kitchen with all modern appliances. Refrigerator, stove, dishwasher, garbage disposal and microwave oven. Washer and dryer in the unit. The kitchen is open to the living and dinning rooms with sitting spaces for three at the kitchen counter. It is perfect for entertaining. There are beautiful views of the bay from the living room/dining room and one of the bedrooms. The unit comes with parking for one car. Additional parking available for a fee. The condo is located at the BayCrest Towers Condominiums. This is a full service building. There is a concierge desk and security 24 hours 7 days a week. There is a pool, Jacuzzi, racquetball court, full gym, aerobics and weight room, tanning room, two BBQ gardens and a central garden. The building is located on the heart of South Beach on the corner of Harrison and Main Streets. Conveniently located a few blocks from BART/MUNI and exits to HWY 101, HWY 280 and Bay Bridge. It is an easy walk to all water front restaurants and SOMA night clubs. Also, a 5 minutes walk to downtown embarcaderos. If interested please call/text 415-246-4222

head: Make life Cerano.. Luxury apartment homes! All NEW!
Downtown Palo Alto Duplex w/ Bonus Office / Artist Studio
post: Available July 1st, 2 BR 1 BA back unit of Duplex with a separately accessed finished basement that can be used as an office, bonus room, or artist studio in downtown Palo Alto. Located on a tree lined street in a prime downtown Palo Alto location, Zillow gives this address a walking score of 94/100, calling it a walkers paradise. Main living area is @ 800 sqf, 2 BR 1 BA with combined open living area & kitchen. Hardwood floors plus natural stone tile in updated bath. New electric stove, 2 year old whisper quiet dishwasher. Skylights in kitchen and master bedroom help to fill the home with natural light. Large sliding glass windows open to a spacious fenced in back patio area, a small deck steps down from the living area to patio pavers, perfect for outdoor cooking and shaded by a mature heritage oak. Laundry is located in a common area and is shared with front half of duplex. A pull down ladder in the main living level provides access to @ 20 x 20 attic storage area. A finished basement is accessed through the common laundry area, providing an additional @ 525 sqf of space that consist of 2 rooms plus a full bath. The largest room is a bonus room and wet bar that could be used as an office, home theater (prewired with in-ceiling speakers), or artist studio. Next is a 7x11 room that could be a work shop, hobby area, office, or storage, the last room is a full bath. The finished basement has ceramic tile floors throughout, ceilings are low at @ 81. Property is clean and well maintained. Stanford campus is a short bike commute or a long walk away and easily accessible via the Homer pedestrian underpass. House is wired for ethernet with wall jacks throughout. Street parking only -- sorry, there is no driveway or garage storage available. A well behaved cat or dog will be considered, pets must be approved by me in person and if approved will be named on a lease addendum, a $500 pet deposit is required. Tenant pays water, sewer, trash, electric. Utilities are gas hot water heater; electric baseboard heaters with each room controlled by its own thermostat. Downstairs office / bonus room has wall mounted electric heaters on individually controlled thermostats. Rent is $5475 per month with $100 credited back to compensate for common area utilities (washer, dryer, lighting in the common area, and outdoor low voltage lighting) that are powered by this units utilities. Landlord provides weekly gardener / leaf blowing. No smokers. Credit, employment, and reference checks will be performed. 12 month lease, renewable at end of lease. $4000 Security deposit. Living here will make you forget you own a car: University Ave: (3 blocks puts you in the heart of University Ave shopping) Schools: Addison Elementary (3.5 blocks), Jordan Middle (1.5 mi) Palo Alto High, (8 blocks) Groceries: Trader Joes (7 blocks), Whole Foods (3 blocks) Pharmacy: CVS & Walgreens (3 blocks) Coffee Shops: Peets (3 of them within 3-7 blocks), Starbucks & numerous other coffee shops Town & Country Shopping Center: 7 block walk via the Homer Underpass. Professional services: Dentists, opticians, doctors throughout the neighborhood Automotive repair: 3 blocks Palo Alto Medical Center: 6 blocks via the Homer Ave pedestrian underpass Heritage Park (1 block), Johnson Park (5 blocks), Rinconada Park (1.1 mile) CalTrain: Downtown Palo Alto station (8 blocks) Post office: (3 blocks) Farmers Market: May through November (3 blocks) If you are willing to drive, Major retailers within 5 miles include Costco, Target, Walmart, and everything at the Stanford Shopping Center.

head: Westside Upgraded 2 Bed/2 Bath Townhouse
post: AVAILABLE NOW! Westside 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom, 2 story townhouse with private pool and hot tub (the other rented unit is a 3 bedroom, 2 bath single-story house). Upstairs their is a living room, bedroom, and bathroom with an extra large all tile shower, fireplace, gas heating, high exposed beam ceilings, and a private backyard deck with views of the Sonoma mountains. Downstairs has a brand new bedroom and bathroom with a deep soaking tub and shower, gas and electric heating, and a large side yard with a storage shed. The backyard has a pool, hot tub and established garden on a drip system. The townhouse could be enjoyed as two private units with each person having behind a locked door a living room, bedroom and bathroom and only share the kitchen and laundry. Top down/bottom up window coverings throughout. There is no garage but there is off street parking in a large driveway to park two to three cars (depending on the size of each). Pool cleaning service will be included in the rental price. The townhouse is available now. The pool is being remodeled and will be finished by July 1. One year lease. No pets or smoking. Please respond by e-mail or call 707-696-5210 for an appointment to view this very special and very private townhouse.
